revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=emergence of a problem social is infection of a disease |Aliases= |Source schema=Enfermedad |Target schema=Estados sociales |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=En el primera final en que ganaron 'los cremas', jugado en su estadio "El Monumental", se generaron brotes de violencia con la destrucción de ventanas, casas, centros comerciales, asaltos y vehículos apedreados. |Example.Gloss=in the first final in that they.won 'the cream', played in their stadium "the Monumental", were generated outbreaks of violence with the destruction of windows, houses, centers shopping, assaults and vehicles stoned |Example.English translation=In the first final in which they won 'the cream', played in their stadium 'The Monumental one', generated outbreaks of violence with the destruction of windows, houses, shopping centers, assaults and stoned vehicles. |Example.Comments=se generaron brotes de violencia }} |Entered by=Karie, |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=degree of similarity is degree of proximity |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=GRADO DE SIMILITUD ES GRADO DE PROXIMIDAD }} |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=Próximo lejano |Target schema=Similitud |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=SIMILITUD ES PROXIMIDAD }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=A medida que los niveles impositivos está estrechamente relacionados a los ingresos del contribuyente la incidencia del impuesto está progresivamente ligada a su riqueza. |Example.Gloss=to extent that the levels tax are tightly related to the income of.the taxpayer the incidence of.the tax is progressively be.linked to his wealth |Example.English translation="To the extent that tax levels are closely related to the income of the taxpayer, the effect of the tax is progressively linked to his wealth." |Example.Provenance=http://portal.veracruz.gob.mx/pls/portal/docs/PAGE/COLVER/DIFUSION/REVISTA_CONCIENCIA/REVISTANO.4/02_REN%C9%20BLANCO%20GONZ%C1LEZ.PDF |Example.Annotation="niveles impositivos está estrechamente relacionados a los ingresos del contribuyente", 'incidencia del impuesto está progresivamente ligada a su riqueza" }} |Entered by=Oana, Karie |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEGREE OF SIMILARITY IS DEGREE OF PROXIMITY |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=be poor is be in the base of a pyramid |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ESTAR POBRE ES ESTAR EN LA BASE DE UNA PIRÁMIDE }} |Family=Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Estructura física |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El efecto de la crisis económica y el desempleo en Estados Unidos ha sido el empobrecimiento de amplios sectores de la clase media, pero más aún de quienes están en la base de la pirámide. |Example.Gloss=The effect of the crisis economic and the unemployment in States United has been the impoverishment of broad sectors of the class middle but more even of who are in the base of the pyramid. |Example.English translation=The effect of the economic crisis and unemployment in the United States has been the impoverishment of broad sectors of the middle class, but even more of those who are in the base of the pyramid. |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/mercados-estadisticas/2011/08/07/mas-mexicanos-base-piramide |Example.Comments=la base de la pirámide }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=A este se le tiene que acompasar un acuerdo estratégico para realmente incrementar los ingresos de los estratos situados en la base de la pirámide. |Example.Gloss=To this refl ind.obj has to fall-in-step an agreement strategic for really increment the incomes of the strata situated in the base of the pyramid |Example.English translation=To this end, it is necessary to follow a strategic agreement to truly increase the incomes of those strata situated at the base of the pyramid. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2013/02/20/politica/026a2pol |Example.Comments=la base de la pirámide }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

page.title: Metaphor:ELIMINAR LA POBREZA ES CURAR UNA ENFERMEDAD

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=eliminate the poverty is cure a disease |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ELIMINAR LA POBREZA ES CURAR UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Family=Goberna...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=eliminate the poverty is cure a disease |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ELIMINAR LA POBREZA ES CURAR UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Family=Gobernación, Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Enfermedad |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UNA ENFERMEDAD }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ELIMINAR PROBLEMAS SOCIALES ES CURAR UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La actual explosión filantrópica es, así, un intento de curar el cáncer de la pobreza con paños calientes, cataplasmas y buenas intenciones. |Example.Gloss=the present explosion philanthropic is like-this an attempt to cure the cancer of the poverty with towels hot poultices and good intentions |Example.English translation=The present philanthropic explosion is, therefore, an attempt to cure the cancer of poverty with hot towels, poultices, and good intentions. |Example.Provenance=http://www.antorchacampesina.org.mx/articulos/acm/2010/acm070510.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Si bien es cierto que se viven tiempos políticos, es de esperarse que los mensajes del Presidente deriven en acciones mucho más efectivas que la pretensión de curar el cáncer de la pobreza en el país con más raquíticas despensas, cuyo objetivo pareciera más el justificar un gasto administrativo que incidir en la nutrición de los empobrecidos. |Example.Gloss=if well is certain that refl live times political is of hope that the messages of-the President derive in actions much more effective than the pretension of cure the cancer of the poverty in the country with more paltry handouts whose objective seems more the justify an expense administrative than impact in the nutrition of the impoverished |Example.English translation=Since it's true that these are political times, we can only hope that the messages of the President lead to much more effective action than pretending to cure the cancer of poverty in the country with more paltry handouts, whose objective seems more to justify administrative costs than to have any effect on the nutrition of the malnourished. |Example.Provenance=http://www.sintesis.mx/hidalgo/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=17776&catid=47:opinion-local&Itemid=71 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Todo parece apuntar, más bien, a una política bien planeada de “rifle sanitario” para curar la pobreza y el descontento de los oaxaqueños. |Example.Gloss=all appears to point more well to a policy well planned of rifle sanity to cure the poverty and the discontent of the Oaxacans |Example.English translation=Rather, everything seems to point to a well-planned policy of "culling the herd" to cure the poverty and discontent of the Oaxacan people. |Example.Provenance=http://www.lapolitica.com.mx/?p=84645 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El discurso recurrente del Gobierno es recibir inversión de otros lugares para curar la pobreza que cada vez es mayor en México. |Example.Gloss=the discourse recurrent of-the Government is receive investment from other places to cure the poverty that each time is greater in Mexico |Example.English translation=The recurring theme of the Government is to attract foreign investment to cure the ever growing poverty in Mexico. |Example.Provenance=http://eldiariodevictoria.com.mx/2011/07/01/%C2%BFquien-cuidara-a-los-ninos/ }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=eliminate the poverty is cure a disease |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ELIMINAR LA POBREZA ES CURAR UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Family=Gobernación, Metáforas de Pobreza, CURAR UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La actual explosión filantrópica es, así, un intento de curar el cáncer de la pobreza con paños calientes, cataplasmas y buenas intenciones. |Example.Gloss=the present explosion philanthropic is like-this an attempt to cure the cancer of the poverty with towels hot poultices and good intentions |Example.English translation=The present philanthropic explosion is, therefore, an attempt to cure the cancer of poverty with hot towels, poultices, and good intentions. |Example.Provenance=http://www.antorchacampesina.org.mx/articulos/acm/2010/acm070510.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Si bien es cierto que se viven tiempos políticos, es de esperarse que los mensajes del Presidente deriven en acciones mucho más efectivas que la pretensión de curar el cáncer de la pobreza en el país con más raquíticas despensas, cuyo objetivo pareciera más el justificar un gasto administrativo que incidir en la nutrición de los empobrecidos. |Example.Gloss=if well is certain that refl live times political is of hope that the messages of-the President derive in actions much more effective than the pretension of cure the cancer of the poverty in the country with more paltry handouts whose objective seems more the justify an expense administrative than impact in the nutrition of the impoverished |Example.English translation=Since it's true that these are political times, we can only hope that the messages of the President lead to much more effective action than pretending to cure the cancer of poverty in the country with more paltry handouts, whose objective seems more to justify administrative costs than to have any effect on the nutrition of the malnourished. |Example.Provenance=http://www.sintesis.mx/hidalgo/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=17776&catid=47:opinion-local&Itemid=71 }}{{Example page.title: Metaphor:ECONOMÍA ES UNA ESTRUCTURA FÍSICA COMPLEJA

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=economy is a structure physical complex |Aliases= |Source schema=Estructura física |Target schema=Economía |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailme...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=economy is a structure physical complex |Aliases= |Source schema=Estructura física |Target schema=Economía |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El gobernador Núñez tendrá que impulsar muy complejo proyecto de recuperación de Tabasco que perdió en décadas recientes el lugar relevante que tenía para estar hoy en un momento crítico con su aparato económico gravemente dañado. |Example.Gloss=The governor Núñez will-have to push very complex project of recuperation of Tabasco that lost in decades recent the place relevant that had to be today in a moment critical with its apparatus economic gravely damaged. |Example.English translation=Governor Núñez will have to push forward a complex recovery project for the state of Tabasco, which has in recent decades lost its former relevance, finding itself in a critical moment with its economic apparatus gravely damaged. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2013/01/06/opinion/006o1pol |Example.Comments="aparato económico gravemente dañado" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Durante 1924 su gobierno llevó a cabo una política obrera radical que si bien es cierto que, por un lado, respaldó e incluso fomentó las demandas de dicho sector, por el otro afectó la frágil economía local al disminuir la recaudación fiscal como resultado de las crisis obrero-patronales. |Example.Gloss=During 1924 his government brought to end a politics worker radical that if well is true that for one side backed and even encouraged the demands of said sector for the other affected the fragile economy local by diminish the revenue fiscal as result of the crisis worker-owner |Example.English translation=In 1924 his government enacted radical labor policies that, it is true, on the one side, supported and even encouraged the demands of that sector, on the other hand it affected the fragile local economy by diminishing revenue as a result of the labor-owner crises. |Example.Provenance=http://bibliotecadigital.ilce.edu.mx/sites/estados/libros/sanluis/html/sec_82.html |Example.Comments="la frágil economía local" }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ECONOMY IS A COMPLEX STRUCTURE |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=control is possession |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=CONTROL ES POSESIÓN }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Posesión |Target schema=Control |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Tienen el país en sus manos. |Example.Gloss=they-have the country in their hands |Example.English translation=[The narcotraffickers] have the country in their hands. |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/espectaculos/91360_old.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Muchos perderían el control que tienen sobre sus obras. |Example.Gloss=Many would-lose the control that have over their work |Example.English translation=Many would lose the control that they have over their work. |Example.Provenance=http://www.politicadigital.com.mx/?P=leernoticiaprint&Article=21452 |Example.Comments="perder el control" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La operadora mexicana de restaurantes Alsea dijo el lunes que acordó con la estadunidense Starbucks Corp tomar el control del 100 por ciento de las operaciones de las populares cafeterías en México. |Example.Gloss=the operator Mexican of restaurants Alsea said the Monday that agreed with the U.S. Starbucks Corp. take the control of 100 percent of the operations of the popular cafes in Mexico |Example.English translation=Alsea restaurants Mexican operator said Monday it agreed with the U.S. Starbucks Corp. take control of 100 percent of the operations of the popular cafes in Mexico. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/ultimas/2013/04/01/1758868-alsea-dice-obtiene-control-total-de-cafeterias-starbucks-en-mexico |Example.Comments="tomar el control" }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe, Karie, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=CONTROL IS POSSESSION |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Tags=tentative |Target schema= |Source schema= |Family=Gobernación |Entered by=Oana |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish |Aliases= |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=Mendicidad |Target schema=Asistencia Gubernamental |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text= La miseria y la carencia de recursos para poder comer quedaron de manifiesto en el peregrinaje de aproximadamente cinco mil indígenas de cuarenta comunidades de Mezquital, para recoger una "limosna" del Gobierno Federal como fue calificado por algunos de ellos el programa Procampo. |Example.Gloss=The misery and the lack of resources for be-able eat left of manifest in the pilgrimage of approximately five thousand indigenous of forty communities of Mezquital for pick-up a 'hand-out' of-the Government Federal as it-was qualified by some of them the program Procampo |Example.English translation=The misery and lack of resources to acquire food was made obvious in the pilgrimage of approximately five thousand indigenous people from forty communities in Mezquital, to receive a 'hand-out' from the Federal Government, as some of them referred to the Procampo program. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsiglodetorreon.com.mx/noticia/184599.la-pobreza-hace-fila.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Que insensibilidad! A una mujer que ha perdido el fruto de su esfuerzo de muchos años y que esta desesperada por su situación y que en su mentalidad en lugar de pedir una limosna del gobierno pide trabajo para nuevamente levantarse, se le conteste con frases de este tipo. |Example.Gloss=what insensitivity to a woman that has lost the fruit of her effort of many years and that is desperate for her situation and that in her mentality in place of request a hand-out of-the government requests job for again stand-up one her answers with phrases of this type |Example.English translation=How insensitive! To a woman who has lost the fruit of her labor of many years and that is desperate over her situation and that, in her mentality, instead of asking for a government handout, asks for a job in order to pick herself up again, and they respond to her with phrases like this. |Example.Provenance= Que insensibilidad!!!! a uma mujer que ah perdido el fruto de su esfuerso de muchos años y que esta desesperada por su situacion y que en su mentalidad en lugar de pedir una limosna del gobierno pide trabajo para nuevamente levantarse, se le conteste con frases de este tipo. |Example.Comments=User comment, edited for orthography. }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=GOVERNMENT ASSISTANCE IS A HANDOUT |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=Mendicidad |Target schema=Asistencia Gubernamental |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La miseria y la carencia de recursos para poder comer quedaron de manifiesto en el peregrinaje de aproximadamente cinco mil indígenas de cuarenta comunidades de Mezquital, para recoger una "limosna" del Gobierno Federal como fue calificado por algunos de ellos el programa Procampo. |Example.Gloss=The misery and the lack of resources for be-able eat left of manifest in the pilgrimage of approximately five thousand indigenous of forty communities of Mezquital for pick-up a 'hand-out' of-the Government Federal as it-was qualified by some of them the program Procampo |Example.English translation=The misery and lack of resources to acquire food was made obvious in the pilgrimage of approximately five thousand indigenous people from forty communities in Mezquital, to receive a 'hand-out' from the Federal Government, as some of them referred to the Procampo program. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsiglodetorreon.com.mx/noticia/184599.la-pobreza-hace-fila.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Que insensibilidad! A una mujer que ha perdido el fruto de su esfuerzo de muchos años y que esta desesperada por su situación y que en su mentalidad en lugar de pedir una limosna del gobierno pide trabajo para nuevamente levantarse, se le conteste con frases de este tipo. |Example.Gloss=what insensitivity to a woman that has lost the fruit of her effort of many years and that is desperate for her situation and that in her mentality in place of request a hand-out of-the government requests job for again stand-up one her answers with phrases of this type |Example.English translation=How insensitive! To a woman who has lost the fruit of her labor of many years and that is desperate over her situation and that, in her mentality, instead of asking for a government handout, asks for a job in order to pick herself up again, and they respond to her with phrases like this. |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/notas/659000.html |Example.Comments=User comment, edited for orthography. }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=GOVERNMENT ASSISTANCE IS A HANDOUT |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Metaphor Level=Specific |Source schema=Mendicidad |Target schema=Asistencia Gubernamental |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La miseria y la carencia de recursos para poder comer quedaron de manifiesto en el peregrinaje de aproximadamente cinco mil indígenas de cuarenta comunidades de Mezquital, para recoger una "limosna" del Gobierno Federal como fue calificado por algunos de ellos el programa Procampo. |Example.Gloss=The misery and the lack of resources for be-able eat left of manifest in the pilgrimage of approximately five thousand indigenous of forty communities of Mezquital for pick-up a 'hand-out' of-the Government Federal as it-was qualified by some of them the program Procampo |Example.English translation=The misery and lack of resources to acquire food was made obvious in the pilgrimage of approximately five thousand indigenous people from forty communities in Mezquital, to receive a 'hand-out' from the Federal Government, as some of them referred to the Procampo program. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsiglodetorreon.com.mx/noticia/184599.la-pobreza-hace-fila.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Que insensibilidad! A una mujer que ha perdido el fruto de su esfuerzo de muchos años y que esta desesperada por su situación y que en su mentalidad en lugar de pedir una limosna del gobierno pide trabajo para nuevamente levantarse, se le conteste con frases de este tipo. |Example.Gloss=what insensitivity to a woman that has lost the fruit of her effort of many years and that is desperate for her situation and that in her mentality in place of request a hand-out of-the government requests job for again stand-up one her answers with phrases of this type |Example.English translation=How insensitive! To a woman who has lost the fruit of her labor of many years and that is desperate over her situation and that, in her mentality, instead of asking for a government handout, asks for a job in order to pick herself up again, and they respond to her with phrases like this. |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/notas/659000.html |Example.Comments=User comment, edited for orthography. }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=GOVERNMENT ASSISTANCE IS A HANDOUT |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES ABAJO }} |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Dinero |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=A este se le tiene que acompasar un acuerdo estratégico para realmente incrementar los ingresos de los estratos situados en la base de la pirámide. |Example.Gloss=To this refl ind.obj has to fall-in-step an agreement strategic for really increment the incomes of the strata situated in the base of the pyramid |Example.English translation=To this end, it is necessary to follow a strategic agreement to truly increase the incomes of those strata situated at the base of the pyramid. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2013/02/20/politica/026a2pol |Example.Comments="la base de la pirámide" = los pobres }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES ABAJO }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Dinero |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=A este se le tiene que acompasar un acuerdo estratégico para realmente incrementar los ingresos de los estratos situados en la base de la pirámide. |Example.Gloss=To this refl ind.obj has to fall-in-step an agreement strategic for really increment the incomes of the strata situated in the base of the pyramid |Example.English translation=To this end, it is necessary to follow a strategic agreement to truly increase the incomes of those strata situated at the base of the pyramid. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2013/02/20/politica/026a2pol |Example.Comments="la base de la pirámide" = los pobres }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Una cuarta parte de los europeos, bajo amenaza de caer en la pobreza o la exclusión social |Example.Gloss=One fourth part of the Europeans under threat of fall in the poverty or the exclusion social |Example.English translation=One quarter of Europeans under the threat of falling into poverty or social exclusion. |Example.Provenance=http://noticias.terra.com.mx/mundo/una-cuarta-parte-de-los-europeos-bajo-amenaza-de-caer-en-la-pobreza-o-la-exclusion-social,bb92de0e2675b310VgnCLD2000000ec6eb0aRCRD.html |Example.Comments="caer en la pobreza" }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is down |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES ABAJO }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UN LUGAR }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=A este se le tiene que acompasar un acuerdo estratégico para realmente incrementar los ingresos de los estratos situados en la base de la pirámide. |Example.Gloss=To this refl ind.obj has to fall-in-step an agreement strategic for really increment the incomes of the strata situated in the base of the pyramid |Example.English translation=To this end, it is necessary to follow a strategic agreement to truly increase the incomes of those strata situated at the base of the pyramid. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2013/02/20/politica/026a2pol |Example.Comments="la base de la pirámide" = los pobres }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Una cuarta parte de los europeos, bajo amenaza de caer en la pobreza o la exclusión social |Example.Gloss=One fourth part of the Europeans under threat of fall in the poverty or the exclusion social |Example.English translation=One quarter of Europeans under the threat of falling into poverty or social exclusion. |Example.Provenance=http://noticias.terra.com.mx/mundo/una-cuarta-parte-de-los-europeos-bajo-amenaza-de-caer-en-la-pobreza-o-la-exclusion-social,bb92de0e2675b310VgnCLD2000000ec6eb0aRCRD.html |Example.Comments="caer en la pobreza" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Que insensibilidad! pick herself up again, and they respond to her with phrases like this. |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/notas/659000.html |Example.Comments="un trabajo para nuevamente levantarse" ("a empobrecimiento de amplios sectores de la clase media, pero más aún de quienes están en la base de la pirámide. |Example.Gloss=The effect of the crisis economic and the unemployment in States United has been the impoverishment of broad sectors of the class middle but more even of who are in the base of the pyramid. |Example.English translation=The effect of the economic crisis and unemployment in the United States has been the impoverishment of broad sectors of the middle class, but even more of those who are in the base of the pyramid. |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/mercados-estadisticas/2011/08/07/mas-mexicanos-base-piramide |Example.Comments="la base de la pirámide" = los pobres }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Porque eso signiﬁca que uno está convencido de que los que están en el fondo de la sociedad merecen su fracaso y los que están arriba merecen su éxito. |Example.Gloss=because that signifies that one is convinced of that those that are in the bottom of the society deserve their failure and those that are above deserve their success |Example.English translation=Because that means that one is convinced that those at the bottom of society deserve their failure and those that are on top deserve their success. |Example.Provenance=http://portal.iteso.mx/portal/page/portal/Sinectica/Historico/Numeros_anteriores06/029/libros.pdf |Example.Comments=fondo de la sociedad }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

|Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Porque eso signiﬁca que uno está convencido de que los que están en el fondo de la sociedad merecen su fracaso y los que están arriba merecen su éxito. |Example.Gloss=because that signifies that one is convinced of that those that are in the bottom of the society deserve their failure and those that are above deserve their success |Example.English translation=Because that means that one is convinced that those at the bottom of society deserve their failure and those that are on top deserve their success. |Example.Provenance=http://portal.iteso.mx/portal/page/portal/Sinectica/Historico/Numeros_anteriores06/029/libros.pdf |Example.Comments=fondo de la sociedad }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Con una tasa de deserción de 40% en bachillerato, y 6 millones de iletrados, México parece condenado a permanecer en el hoyo de la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=with a rate of desertion of 40% in high-school and six million of illiterate Mexico appears condemned to remain in the hole of the poverty |Example.English translation=With a high school drop-out rate of 40% and six million illiterates, Mexico appears condemned to remain in the hole of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vanguardia.com.mx/ungrispanoramavenparamexico-431987.html |Example.Comments=hoyo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Una cosa es que los ricos se estuvieran haciendo más ricos y a los de en medio y a los de abajo también les fuera mejor, sobre todo si los esfuerzos de los de arriba fueran cruciales para los éxitos de los demás. En ese caso podríamos celebrar los éxitos de los de arriba, y estarles agradecidos por su contribución. Pero eso no es lo que ha venido ocurriendo |Example.Gloss=one thing is that the rich refl were making more rich and to those of in middle and to those of above also to-them it-went better above all if the efforts of those of above were crucial for the successes of the rest. In that case we-could celebrate the successes of those of above and be-to-them grateful for their contribution but that not is what that has come occurring |Example.English translation=One thing would be for the rich to get richer while those in the middle class and at the bottom also improve, above all if the efforts of those on top were crucial for the successes of everyone else. In that case we could celebrate the successes of those on top and be grateful to them for their contribution. But this is not what has been happening. |Example.Provenance=http://www.razon.com.mx/spip.php?page=columnista&id_article=156698 |Example.Comments="los de abajo" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=En 2008 aumentará la clase baja en México. |Example.Gloss=In 2008 will-augment the class low in Mexico. |Example.English translation=In 2008, the lower class in Mexico will grow. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsiglodedurango.com.mx/noticia/184017.en-2008-aumentara-la-clase-baja-en-mexico.html |Example.Comments=clase baja }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza que vive en el olvido, con los desgarradores contrastes entre el México de arriba y sus sueños de desarrollo y el México de abajo y su lucha cotidiana por sobrevivir. |Example.Gloss=Us submerge in the abyss of the poverty that lives in the forgetting with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico of above and their dreams of development and the Mexico of below and their struggle daily to survive. |Example.English translation=We are submerged in the abyss of poverty that lives forgotten, with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico on top and their dreams of development and the Mexico at the bottom and their daily struggle to survive. |Example.Provenance=http://ladobe.com.mx/2012/03/mexico-rebelde-de-john-gibler/ |Example.Comments=el México de abajo }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

la sociedad merecen su fracaso y los que están arriba merecen su éxito. |Example.Gloss=because that signifies that one is convinced of that those that are in the bottom of the society deserve their failure and those that are above deserve their success |Example.English translation=Because that means that one is convinced that those at the bottom of society deserve their failure and those that are on top deserve their success. |Example.Provenance=http://portal.iteso.mx/portal/page/portal/Sinectica/Historico/Numeros_anteriores06/029/libros.pdf |Example.Comments=fondo de la sociedad }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Con una tasa de deserción de 40% en bachillerato, y 6 millones de iletrados, México parece condenado a permanecer en el hoyo de la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=with a rate of desertion of 40% in high-school and six million of illiterate Mexico appears condemned to remain in the hole of the poverty |Example.English translation=With a high school drop-out rate of 40% and six million illiterates, Mexico appears condemned to remain in the hole of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vanguardia.com.mx/ungrispanoramavenparamexico-431987.html |Example.Comments=hoyo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Una cosa es que los ricos se estuvieran haciendo más ricos y a los de en medio y a los de abajo también les fuera mejor, sobre todo si los esfuerzos de los de arriba fueran cruciales para los éxitos de los demás. En ese caso podríamos celebrar los éxitos de los de arriba, y estarles agradecidos por su contribución. Pero eso no es lo que ha venido ocurriendo |Example.Gloss=one thing is that the rich refl were making more rich and to those of in middle and to those of above also to-them it-went better above all if the efforts of those of above were crucial for the successes of the rest. In that case we-could celebrate the successes of those of above and be-to-them grateful for their contribution but that not is what that has come occurring |Example.English translation=One thing would be for the rich to get richer while those in the middle class and at the bottom also improve, above all if the efforts of those on top were crucial for the successes of everyone else. In that case we could celebrate the successes of those on top and be grateful to them for their contribution. But this is not what has been happening. |Example.Provenance=http://www.razon.com.mx/spip.php?page=columnista&id_article=156698 |Example.Comments="los de abajo" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=En 2008 aumentará la clase baja en México. |Example.Gloss=In 2008 will-augment the class low in Mexico. |Example.English translation=In 2008, the lower class in Mexico will grow. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsiglodedurango.com.mx/noticia/184017.en-2008-aumentara-la-clase-baja-en-mexico.html |Example.Comments=clase baja }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza que vive en el olvido, con los desgarradores contrastes entre el México de arriba y sus sueños de desarrollo y el México de abajo y su lucha cotidiana por sobrevivir. |Example.Gloss=Us submerge in the abyss of the poverty that lives in the forgetting with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico of above and their dreams of development and the Mexico of below and their struggle daily to survive. |Example.English translation=We are submerged in the abyss of poverty that lives forgotten, with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico on top and their dreams of development and the Mexico at the bottom and their daily struggle to survive. |Example.Provenance=http://ladobe.com.mx/2012/03/mexico-rebelde-de-john-gibler/ |Example.Comments=el México de abajo }} |Entered by=Joe |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=inability to face problems social is inability to treat a disease |Aliases= |Family=Gobernación, |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La corrupción y su correlato, la impunidad, hacen imposible el proyecto nacional y hunden al país de modo progresivo en una especie de enfermedad crónica e incurable. |Example.Gloss=the corruption and its correlate the impunity make impossible the project national and submerge the country of mode gradual in a kind of disease chronic and incurable |Example.English translation=Corruption, and its correlate, impunity, are making the national project impossible and gradually submerging the nation into a sort of chronic and incurable disease. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2013/02/24/opinion/014o1pol }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=INABILITY TO ADDRESS SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS INABILITY TO TREAT A DISEASE |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=LAS INSTITUCIONES |Target schema=MÁQUINAS |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Lo que viene es el estallido de una gran bomba económica, si el 31 de diciembre no hay un acuerdo presupuestal que incluya reducciones a los gastos del gobierno federal e incremento en sus ingresos. |Example.Gloss=it that comes is the explosion of the large bomb economic, if the 31 of December no is an agreement budget that includes reductions of the expenses of government federal and increase in their income |Example.English translation=What comes is the explosion of a large economic pump, if on December 31 there is a budget agreement that includes reductions to the cost of the federal Government and increase in their income. |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/caja-fuerte/2012/12/27/fiscal-cliff-eu-juega-ser-republica-bananera }} |Entered by=Oana, Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=impediments to improve the state economic are forces opposite |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=IMPEDIMENTOS PARA MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO SON FUERZAS OPUESTAS }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Fuerza física |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=DIFICULTADES SON IMPEDIMENTOS AL MOVIMIENTO }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO ES SALIR DE UN LUGAR INDESEABLE }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=¿Por qué no se derriban las barreras que impiden a los pobres salir de su estado de pobreza? |Example.Gloss=for why not refl knock-down the barriers that impede to the poor go-out from their state of poverty |Example.English translation=Why aren't the barriers impeding the poor from leaving their state of poverty knocked down? |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsoldenayarit.mx/?tema=Opini%25F3n&id_nota=5991 |Example.Comments=barreras que impiden a los pobres }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Pueden fomentar la aparición de instituciones que bloquean a los pobres dentro de las trampas de pobreza |Example.Gloss=they-can encourage the appearance of institutions that block to the poor inside of the traps of poverty |Example.English translation=[Inequalities] can encourage the appearance of institutions that block the poor into the traps of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.escenarios.unam.mx/PONENCIAS/katjaH.pdf |Example.Comments=instituciones que bloquean a los pobres }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is an enclosure environmental |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES UN ENCIERRO AMBIENTAL }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Encierro Ambiental |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UN LUGAR }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=LIBERTAD DE ACCIÓN ES LIBERTAD DE MOVIMIENTO |Related metaphor.Description=Un encierro quita la libertad de movimiento así como la pobreza quita la libertad de acción. }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=DIFICULTADES SON IMPEDIMENTOS AL MOVIMIENTO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Todavía tenía un largo camino por delante para realizar el sueño de sacar a su familia del hoyo de la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=Still has a long path by forward to realize the dream of take-out to his family from-the hole of the poverty. |Example.English translation=He still has a long path ahead of him to realize his dream of getting his family out of the hole of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.opusdei.org.mx/art.php?p=6186 |Example.Comments=sacar a su familia del hoyo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La crisis económica internacional provocará que seis millones de personas más caigan en el abismo de la pobreza en 2009 en Latinoamérica, dijo hoy un alto funcionario del Banco Mundial (BM). |Example.Gloss=the crisis economic international will-provoke that six millions of people more fall in the abyss of the poverty in 2009 in Latin-America said today a high functionary of-the Bank World (WB) |Example.English translation=The economic crisis will cause six million more people to fall into the abyss of poverty in 2009 in Latin America, a high-ranking official of the World Bank said today. |Example.Provenance=http://www.comunicacampeche.com.mx/Php/noticiacomlocal.php?id=17789 |Example.Comments=caigan en el abismo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza que vive en el olvido, con los desgarradores contrastes entre el México de arriba y sus sueños de desarrollo y el México de abajo y su lucha cotidiana por sobrevivir. |Example.Gloss=Us submerge in the abyss of the poverty that lives in the forgetting with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico of above and their dreams of development and the Mexico of below and their struggle daily to survive. |Example.English translation=We are submerged in the abyss of poverty that lives forgotten, with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico on top and their dreams of development and the Mexico at the bottom and their daily struggle to survive. |Example.Provenance=http://ladobe.com.mx/2012/03/mexico-rebelde-de-john-gibler/ |Example.Comments=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El aumento desmedido en los precios de los productos básicos no ha hecho más que hundir a más familias mexicanas en el abismo de la pobreza y la carencia de beneficios. |Example.Gloss=the augment disproportionate in the prices of the products basic not has done more than sink to more families Mexican in the abyss of the poverty and the lack of benefits |Example.English translation=The disproportionate increase in the prices of basic products has done nothing more than sink more Mexican families into the abyss of poverty and the lack of benefits. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ptdiputados.org.mx/intervencion.php?id=3 |Example.Comments=el abismo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La elección de un gobierno distinto tiende a detener esta avalancha contra los pueblos pobres, contra los y las trabajadoras, contra nosotros todos pues. |Example.Gloss=the election of a government different tends to detain this avalanche against the people poor against the-male and the-female workers against us all well |Example.English translation=The election of a different government tends to hold back this avalanche against the poor, against workers, and against us all, really. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elregional.com.mx/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=25168:las-izquierdas-proponen&catid=45:opinion&Itemid=65 |Example.Comments=detener esta avalancha contra los pueblos pobres }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

y el México de abajo y su lucha cotidiana por sobrevivir. |Example.Gloss=Us submerge in the abyss of the poverty that lives in the forgetting with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico of above and their dreams of development and the Mexico of below and their struggle daily to survive. |Example.English translation=We are submerged in the abyss of poverty that lives forgotten, with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico on top and their dreams of development and the Mexico at the bottom and their daily struggle to survive. |Example.Provenance=http://ladobe.com.mx/2012/03/mexico-rebelde-de-john-gibler/ |Example.Comments=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El aumento desmedido en los precios de los productos básicos no ha hecho más que hundir a más familias mexicanas en el abismo de la pobreza y la carencia de beneficios. |Example.Gloss=the augment disproportionate in the prices of the products basic not has done more than sink to more families Mexican in the abyss of the poverty and the lack of benefits |Example.English translation=The disproportionate increase in the prices of basic products has done nothing more than sink more Mexican families into the abyss of poverty and the lack of benefits. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ptdiputados.org.mx/intervencion.php?id=3 |Example.Comments=el abismo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La elección de un gobierno distinto tiende a detener esta avalancha contra los pueblos pobres, contra los y las trabajadoras, contra nosotros todos pues. |Example.Gloss=the election of a government different tends to detain this avalanche against the people poor against the-male and the-female workers against us all well |Example.English translation=The election of a different government tends to hold back this avalanche against the poor, against workers, and against us all, really. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elregional.com.mx/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=25168:las-izquierdas-proponen&catid=45:opinion&Itemid=65 |Example.Comments=detener esta avalancha contra los pueblos pobres }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=banks are machines |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=BANCOS SON MÁQUINAS }} |Family=Metáforas Económicas |Source schema=Máquina |Tar...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=banks are machines |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=BANCOS SON MÁQUINAS }} |Family=Metáforas Económicas |Source schema=Máquina |Target schema=Banco |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Un problema fundamental del BCE es que su conformación implicó la eliminación de dos variables de ajuste importantes: el mecanismo de tasas de interés de cada país y el del tipo de cambio, sin sustituirlos por nada; por lo que, cuando un país en lo individual enfrenta una crisis, no tiene forma de adaptarse a través de políticas monetarias o de tipo de cambio. |Example.Gloss=a problem fundamental of.the EBC is that its configuration involved the elimination of two variables of adjustment important: the mechanism of rate of interest of each country and that of.the type of exchange, without replacing.them by nothing; by it that, when a country in it individual faces a crisis, not it.has way of adapting.itself through policies monetary or of type of exchange |Example.English translation="A fundamental problem of the EBC is that its configuration involved the elimination of two important adjustment variables: the interest rate mechanism for each country and that of the exchange rate, without replacing them with anything; so that, when an individual country faces a crisis, it has no way of adapting itself via monetary policies or exchange rates." |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/mercados-estadisticas/2013/04/02/otra-realidad |Example.Annotation="BCE ... su conformación .. variables de ajuste .. mecanismo[s]" }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=proposed |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=impoverishment is movement toward down |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EMPOBRECIMIENTO ES MOVIMIENTO HACIA ABAJO }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Movimiento |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=CAMBIOS SON MOVIMIENTOS }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES ABAJO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Cada minuto, cien personas caen en la pobreza por la crisis. |Example.Gloss=each minute one-hundred people fall in the poverty because-of the crisis |Example.English translation=Every minute, one hundred people fall into poverty as a result of a crisis. |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/notas/628250.html |Example.Comments=caen en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Se entiende por movilidad social la facilidad con la que una persona puede subir o bajar en la escalera socioeconómica. |Example.Gloss=one understands by mobility social the ease with which that a person can ascend or descend in the ladder socioeconomic |Example.English translation=What is understand by social mobility is the ease with which one can ascend or descend the socioeconomic ladder. |Example.Provenance=http://elsemanario.com.mx/revista_semanal/401_1_7_sep/nelly/ |Example.Comments=subir o bajar }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

|Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Oaxaca es un estado con un alto índice de pobreza, situación que provoca la expulsión de mano de obra barata, los habitantes salen a trabajar abandonando las revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=greed is excessive appetite |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=AVARICIA ES APETITO EXCESIVO }} |Family=Pobreza, Riqueza |Metaphor Level=G...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=greed is excessive appetite |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=AVARICIA ES APETITO EXCESIVO }} |Family=Pobreza, Riqueza |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Apetito |Target schema=Avaricia |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=ADQUIRIR RECURSOS ES CONSUMIR COMIDA }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Transnacionales, con apetito voraz en la Cruzada contra el Hambre |Example.Gloss=Transnationals with appetite voracious in the Crusade against the Hunger |Example.English translation=Transnationals, with a voracious appetite in the Crusade Against Hunger |Example.Provenance=http://www.proceso.com.mx/?p=338972 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La voracidad de los políticos capitalinos sólo es opacada por su estupidez. |Example.Gloss=the voracity of the politicians of-the-capital only is obscured by their stupidity |Example.English translation=The voracity of capital politicians is only obscured by their stupidity. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsiglodetorreon.com.mx/noticia/824348.odio-a-los-ricos.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Recalcó que “no es posible que el nuevo gobernador no quiera ir a Cacahuatepec, queremos que primero se siente a negociar y dialogar con los dueños de la tierra, no con los empresarios voraces, no con los ricos poderosos y corruptos”. |Example.Gloss=stressed that not is possible that the new governor not want go to Cacahuatepec we-want that first refl sits to negotiate and dialogue with the owners of the earth not with the businessmen voracious nor with the rich powerful and corrupt |Example.English translation=He stressed that "It's impossible that the new governor refuses to go to Cacahuatepec. We want him first to sit and negotiate and discuss with those that own the land, not with voracious businessmen or the corrupt and powerful rich. |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadaguerrero.com.mx/2011/02/01/index.php?section=regiones&article=007n1reg |Example.Comments=empresarios voraces }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La carestía, el desempleo, la inseguridad, empleos precarios, impunidad, corrupción, voracidad e insaciabilidad de los ricos ... |Example.Gloss=the need the unemployment the insecurity jobs precarious impunity corruption voracity and insatiability of the rich ... |Example.English translation=The need, unemployment, lack of safety, precarious jobs, impunity, corruption, voracity and insatiability of the rich ... |Example.Provenance=http://www.cambiodemichoacan.com.mx/nota-81501 |Example.Comments=voracidad e insaciabilidad de los ricos }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=greed is excessive appetite |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=AVARICIA ES APETITO EXCESIVO }} |Comments=does this metaphor need to be assigned to Poverty Metaphors as well? |Family=Metáforas de Riqueza, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Apetito |Target schema=Avaricia |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=ADQUIRIR RECURSOS ES CONSUMIR COMIDA }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Transnacionales, con apetito voraz en la Cruzada contra el Hambre |Example.Gloss=Transnationals with appetite voracious in the Crusade against the Hunger |Example.English translation=Transnationals, with a voracious appetite in the Crusade Against Hunger |Example.Provenance=http://www.proceso.com.mx/?p=338972 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La voracidad de los políticos capitalinos sólo es opacada por su estupidez. |Example.Gloss=the voracity of the politicians of-the-capital only is obscured by their stupidity |Example.English translation=The voracity of capital politicians is only obscured by their stupidity. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsiglodetorreon.com.mx/noticia/824348.odio-a-los-ricos.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Recalcó que “no es posible que el nuevo gobernador no quiera ir a Cacahuatepec, queremos que primero se siente a negociar y dialogar con los dueños de la tierra, no con los empresarios voraces, no con los ricos poderosos y corruptos”. |Example.Gloss=stressed that not is possible that the new governor not want go to Cacahuatepec we-want that first refl sits to negotiate and dialogue with the owners of the earth not with the businessmen voracious nor with the rich powerful and corrupt |Example.English translation=He stressed that "It's impossible that the new governor refuses to go to Cacahuatepec. We want him first to sit and negotiate and discuss with those that own the land, not with voracious businessmen or the corrupt and powerful rich. |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadaguerrero.com.mx/2011/02/01/index.php?section=regiones&article=007n1reg |Example.Comments=empresarios voraces }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La carestía, el desempleo, la inseguridad, empleos precarios, impunidad, corrupción, voracidad e insaciabilidad de los ricos ... |Example.Gloss=the need the unemployment the insecurity jobs precarious impunity corruption voracity and insatiability of the rich ... |Example.English translation=The need, unemployment, lack of safety, precarious jobs, impunity, corruption, voracity and insatiability of the rich ... |Example.Provenance=http://www.cambiodemichoacan.com.mx/nota-81501 |Example.Comments=voracidad e insaciabilidad de los ricos }} |Entered by=Joe |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=impediments to improve the state economic are obstacles in the path |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=IMPEDIMENTOS PARA MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO SON OBSTACULOS EN EL CAMINO }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Obstáculo en el camino |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=DIFICULTADES SON OBSTÁCULOS EN EL CAMINO }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO ES SALIR DE UN LUGAR INDESEABLE }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Una vez que el estudiante rebasa las barreras de la pobreza, la marginación, la desnutrición, la precaria situación de las escuelas, la reducción de recursos para este sector, e innumerables particularidades de la sociedad y del sistema educativo en México, aumentan sus posibilidades de continuar hasta el nivel superior. |Example.Gloss=one time that the student surpasses the barriers of the poverty the marginalization the malnutrition the precarious situation of the schools the reduction of resources for this sector and innumerable peculiarities of the society and of-the system educational in Mexico increase their possibilities of continue until the level superior |Example.English translation=Once the student surpasses the barriers of poverty, marginalization, malnutrition, the precarious situation of the schools, the reduction of resources for this sector and innumerable peculiarities of society and the Mexican educational system, their chances of continuing to higher education increase. |Example.Provenance=http://www.colson.edu.mx:8080/portales/portales23/portales23.htm |Example.Comments=las barreras de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Al protestar Adriana Dávila como candidata del PAN a la gubernatura de Tlaxcala, destacó que su intención es romper con las barreras de la pobreza y la falta de oportunidades. |Example.Gloss=at-the swearing-in Adriana Dávila as candidate of-the PAN to the governorship of Tlaxcala emphasized that her intention is break with the barriers of the poverty and the lack of opportunities |Example.English translation=At the swearing in of Adriana Dávila as the PAN candidate to the governorship of Tlaxcala, she emphasized that her intention is to break down the barriers of poverty and lack of opportunities. |Example.Provenance=http://www.radioformula.com.mx/notas.asp?Idn=108156 |Example.Comments=las barreras de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=¿Por qué no se derriban las barreras que impiden a los pobres salir de su estado de pobreza? |Example.Gloss=for why not refl knock-down the barriers that impede to the poor go-out from their state of poverty |Example.English translation=Why aren't the barriers impeding the poor from leaving their state of poverty knocked down? |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsoldenayarit.mx/?tema=Opini%25F3n&id_nota=5991 |Example.Comments=barreras que impiden a los pobres }} |Entered by=Joe, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Evaluating is measuring |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EVALUAR ES MEDIR }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Medir |Target schema=Evaluar |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El sondeo difundido este jueves fue con el fin de medir las opciones que tiene un candidato de izquierda en las elecciones presidenciales de 2014.
|Example.Gloss=the poll released this thursday was with the end of measure the options that has a candidate of left in the elections presidential of 2014 |Example.English translation=The poll was released Thursday with the aim of measuring the options for a leftist candidate in the presidential elections of 2014 |Example.Provenance=http://vvovw.elporvenir.com.mx/notas.asp?nota_id=596845 }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ASSESSING IS MEASURING |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=assessing is measuring |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EVALUAR ES MEDIR }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Medir |Target schema=Evaluación |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El sondeo difundido este jueves fue con el fin de medir las opciones que tiene un candidato de izquierda en las elecciones presidenciales de 2014. |Example.Gloss=the poll released this thursday was with the end of measure the options that has a candidate of left in the elections presidential of 2014 |Example.English translation=The poll was released Thursday with the aim of measuring the options for a leftist candidate in the presidential elections of 2014 |Example.Provenance=http://vvovw.elporvenir.com.mx/notas.asp?nota_id=596845 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Para medir el estatus socioeconómico del hogar de los hijos adultos y del hogar de origen de los mismos, se construye un índice de activos que combina un conjunto de bienes y servicios en el hogar; éste se calcula a través de un análisis de componentes principales. |Example.Gloss=for to.measure the status socioeconomic of.the household of the children adult and of.the household of origin of the same, it is.constructed an index of assets that combines a set of goods and services in the home this it is.calculated through an analysis of components principal |Example.English translation="In order to measure the socioeconomic status of the household of adult children and of their home of origin, an asset index is constructed that combines a set of goods of services in the home; this is calculated via an analysis of principal components." |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/columnas/agro-negocios/2013/05/23/movilidad-social-mexico |Example.Annotation="medir el estatus socioeconómico" }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ASSESSING IS MEASURING |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=assessing is measuring |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EVALUAR ES MEDIR }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Medir |Target schema=Evaluación |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El sondeo difundido este jueves fue con el fin de medir las opciones que tiene un candidato de izquierda en las elecciones presidenciales de 2014. |Example.Gloss=the poll released this thursday was with the end of measure the options that has a candidate of left in the elections presidential of 2014 |Example.English translation=The poll was released Thursday with the aim of measuring the options for a leftist candidate in the presidential elections of 2014 |Example.Provenance=http://vvovw.elporvenir.com.mx/notas.asp?nota_id=596845 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Para medir el estatus socioeconómico del hogar de los hijos adultos y del hogar de origen de los mismos, se construye un índice de activos que combina un conjunto de bienes y servicios en el hogar; éste se calcula a través de un análisis de componentes principales. |Example.Gloss=for to.measure the status socioeconomic of.the home of the children adult and of.the home from origin of the same, it is.constructed an index of assets that combines a set of goods and services in the home this it is.calculated through an analysis of components principal |Example.English translation="In order to measure the socioeconomic status of the home of adult children and of their home of origin, an asset index is constructed that puts together a combination of goods and services in the home; this is calculated via a principal components analysis." |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/columnas/agro-negocios/2013/05/23/movilidad-social-mexico |Example.Annotation="medir el estatus socioeconómico" }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ASSESSING IS MEASURING |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=violence is a disease |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=VIOLENCIA ES UN ENFERMEDAD }} |Source schema=Violencia |Target schema=Enfermedad |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=En el primera final en que ganaron 'los cremas', jugado en su estadio "El Monumental", se generaron brotes de violencia con la destrucción de ventanas, casas, centros comerciales, asaltos y vehículos apedreados. |Example.Gloss=in the first final in that they.won 'the cream', played in their stadium "the Monumental", were generated outbreaks of violence with the destruction of windows, houses, centers shopping, assaults and vehicles stoned |Example.English translation=In the first final in which they won '', played in their stadium 'The Monumental one', violence sprouts(outbreaks) were generated with the destruction of windows, houses, shopping centers, assaults and stoned vehicles. |Example.Comments=brotes de violencia }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

Vengo a saludar a las empresas extranjeras que son socios del Estado", dijo Morales. |Example.Gloss=Bolivia needs partners and not owners (...) revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Comments= There are two dimensions to consider: 1. Whether there is a different interior vs. exterior (facade, farce); whether there is an exterio...»
revision.text:
{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Comments= There are two dimensions to consider:
1. Whether there is a different interior vs. exterior (facade, farce); whether there is an exterior while having an empty interior (husks, shells); Interior is understood as the 'expected interior' in the relevant frame.
2. Whether the 'fooling' is intentional or not (there is an Evaluation frame).
Source frame is placeholder. |Family=Metáforas de Democracia |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Interior-Exterior |Target schema=Democracia |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Oana |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEMOCRACY IS A FACADE |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is a facade |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=DEMOCRACIA ES UNA SUPERFICIE EXTERIOR }} |Comments=There are two dimensions to consider:
1. Whether there is a different interior vs. exterior (facade, farce); whether there is an exterior while having an empty interior (husks, shells); Interior is understood as the 'expected interior' in the relevant frame.
2. Whether the 'fooling' is intentional or not (there is an Evaluation frame).
Source frame is placeholder. |Family=Metáforas de Democracia |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Interior-Exterior |Target schema=Democracia |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Subrayó: “Por eso a estos políticos que brincan de partido en partido nosotros ya no les creemos ni les hacemos caso, su democracia es camuflada, sólo para engañar al pueblo. |Example.Gloss=he.stressed because that to these politicians that jump of party in party we already no them we.believe or them we.make case its democracy is camouflaged only for to.deceive to.the people |Example.English translation=He stressed: "That's why these politicians who jump from party to party, we no longer believe them or even pay attention, their democracy is camouflaged, only to deceive the people." |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadamichoacan.com.mx/2013/08/16/la-escuelita-zapatista-revisa-la-otra-democracia-en-su-ultima-sesion/ |Example.Annotation="democracia es camuflada" }} |Entered by=Oana |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEMOCRACY IS A FACADE |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is a facade |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=DEMOCRACIA ES UNA SUPERFICIE EXTERIOR }} |Comments=There are two dimensions to consider:
1. Whether there is a different interior vs. exterior (facade, farce); whether there is an exterior while having an empty interior (husks, shells); Interior is understood as the 'expected interior' in the relevant frame.
2. Whether the 'fooling' is intentional or not (there is an Evaluation frame).
Source frame is placeholder. |Family=Metáforas de Democracia |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Interior-Exterior |Target schema=Democracia |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Subrayó: “Por eso a estos políticos que brincan de partido en partido nosotros ya no les creemos ni les hacemos caso, su democracia es camuflada, sólo para engañar al pueblo. |Example.Gloss=he.stressed because that to these politicians that jump of party in party we already no them we.believe or them we.make case its democracy is camouflaged only for to.deceive to.the people |Example.English translation=He stressed: "That's why these politicians who jump from party to party, we no longer believe them or even pay attention, their democracy is camouflaged, only to deceive the people." |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadamichoacan.com.mx/2013/08/16/la-escuelita-zapatista-revisa-la-otra-democracia-en-su-ultima-sesion/ |Example.Annotation="democracia es camuflada" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Muerto el líder, los sucesores buscan convertir al chavismo en una corporación como el PRI mexicano, que estuvo 70 años en el poder hasta 2000. Es decir, gobernar con la fachada de la democracia pero traicionándola en la práctica. |Example.Gloss=dead the leader the successors look.for to.convert to.the chavism in a corporation like the PRI Mexican that spent 70 years in the power until 2000 it.is to.say to.govern with the facade of the democracy but betraying.it in the practice |Example.English translation="The leader dead, successors sought to convert chavism into a corporation like the Mexican PRI, who spent 70 years in power until 2000. It is to say, to govern with the facade of democracy but betraying it in practice." |Example.Provenance=http://internacional.elpais.com/internacional/2014/01/06/actualidad/1389034100_568076.html |Example.Annotation="fachada de la democracia" }} |Entered by=Oana |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEMOCRACY IS A FACADE |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is a facade |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=DEMOCRACIA ES UNA SUPERFICIE EXTERIOR }} |Comments=There are two dimensions to consider:
1. Whether there is a different interior vs. exterior (facade, farce); whether there is an exterior while having an empty interior (husks, shells); Interior is understood as the 'expected interior' in the relevant frame.
2. Whether the 'fooling' is intentional or not (there is an Evaluation frame).
Source frame is placeholder. |Family=Metáforas de Democracia |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Obstrucciones a la visión |Target schema=Democracia |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Subrayó: “Por eso a estos políticos que brincan de partido en partido nosotros ya no les creemos ni les hacemos caso, su democracia es camuflada, sólo para engañar al pueblo. |Example.Gloss=he.stressed because that to these politicians that jump of party in party we already no them we.believe or them we.make case its democracy is camouflaged only for to.deceive to.the people |Example.English translation=He stressed: "That's why these politicians who jump from party to party, we no longer believe them or even pay attention, their democracy is camouflaged, only to deceive the people." |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadamichoacan.com.mx/2013/08/16/la-escuelita-zapatista-revisa-la-otra-democracia-en-su-ultima-sesion/ |Example.Annotation="democracia es camuflada" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Muerto el líder, los sucesores buscan convertir al chavismo en una corporación como el PRI mexicano, que estuvo 70 años en el poder hasta 2000. Es decir, gobernar con la fachada de la democracia pero traicionándola en la práctica. |Example.Gloss=dead the leader the successors look.for to.convert to.the chavism in a corporation like the PRI Mexican that spent 70 years in the power until 2000 it.is to.say to.govern with the facade of the democracy but betraying.it in the practice |Example.English translation="The leader dead, successors sought to convert chavism into a corporation like the Mexican PRI, who spent 70 years in power until 2000. {{Metaphor |Name gloss=corruption is a disease |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La corrupción y su correlato, la impunidad, hacen imposible el proyecto nacional y hunden al país de modo progresivo en una especie de enfermedad crónica e incurable. |Example.Gloss=the corruption and its correlate the impunity make impossible the project national and submerge the country of mode gradual in a kind of disease chronic and incurable |Example.English translation=Corruption, and its correlate, impunity, are making the national project impossible and gradually submerging the nation into a sort of chronic and incurable disease. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2013/02/24/opinion/014o1pol }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Contenedor |Target schema=Campo visual |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El observar cómo las hojas se abren y cierran, y cómo se mueven los animales de la selva tropical fuera y dentro de la vista del bebé, estimula sus habilidades de seguimiento visual.
|Example.Gloss=the observing how the leaves refl open and close and how refl move the animals of the jungle tropical outside and inside of the view of-the baby stimulates its abilities of following visual |Example.English translation=Observing how the leaves open and close and how the jungle animals move in and out of the baby's view stimulates its capacity for visually following objects. |Example.Provenance=http://articulo.mercadolibre.com.mx/MLM-415582349-columpio-mecedora-rain-forest-fisher-price-_JM |Example.Comments="dentro y fuera de la vista" }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=VISUAL FIELD IS A CONTAINER |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=be rich is be at the top of a pyramid |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ESTAR RICO ES ESTAR EN LA CIMA DE UNA PIRÁMIDE }} |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Entailed |Source schema=Estructura física |Target schema=Riqueza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=RIQUEZA ES ARRIBA }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El Banco de México informó que en el último ciclo, los ricos mexicanos continuaron concentrando fortunas a costa de depauperar más al colectivo. Así, el diez por ciento de la población, en la cima de la pirámide, aglutina, nada menos, el 41.3 por ciento del total del ingreso nacional, asimilando 439 mil 597 millones de dólares. |Example.Gloss=The Bank of Mexico informed that in the last cycle the rich Mexican continued concentrating fortunes at cost of make-pauper more to-the collective. In-this-way the ten per cent of the population at the top of the pyramid aggregates no less the 41.3 per cent of-the total of the income national assimilating 439 thousand 597 millions of dollars. |Example.English translation=The Bank of Mexico reported that in the last cycle, wealthy Mexicans continued concentrating their fortunates at the cost of further impoverishing the collective. In this way, the ten percent of the population at the top of the pyramid accumulates no less than 41.3 percent of the total national product, assimilating some 9,597,000,000 |Example.Provenance=http://www.eldiariodecoahuila.com.mx/includes/modulos/imprimir.asp?id=176936&tipo=noticia |Example.Comments=cima de la pirámide }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}
