revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is a restraint constructed |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES UNA RESTRICCIÓN CONSTRUIDA }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is a restraint constructed |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES UNA RESTRICCIÓN CONSTRUIDA }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Restricción construida |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=DIFICULTADES SON IMPEDIMENTOS AL MOVIMIENTO }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=LIBERTAD DE ACCIÓN ES LIBERTAD DE MOVIMIENTO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Oaxaca es un estado con un alto índice de pobreza, situación que provoca la expulsión de mano de obra barata, los habitantes salen a trabajar abandonando las comunidades marginadas, cayendo en la trampa de la pobreza, denominada migración de supervivencia. |Example.Gloss=Oaxaca is a state with a high index of poverty situation that provokes the expulsion of hand of work cheap the inhabitants go-out to work abandoning the communities marginalized falling in the trap of the poverty called migration of survival |Example.English translation=Oaxaca is a state with a high index of poverty, a situation which encourages the exploitation of cheap manual labor. Residents leave to work, abandoning their marginalized communities and falling in the trap of poverty known as survival migration. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vozdelsur.com.mx/oaxaca/7317-migracion-de-supervivencia-y-trampa-de-la-pobreza-en-oaxaca.html |Example.Comments=la trampa de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Encontrar el modo de escapar de la trampa de la pobreza y conseguir que el comercio haga aumentar la renta nacional es verdaderamente difícil. |Example.Gloss=finding the mode of escape from the trap of the poverty and acquire that the commerce makes increase the income national is truly difficult |Example.English translation=Finding the means of escaping the trap of poverty and succeeding in raising the national income through commerce is truly difficult. |Example.Provenance=http://www.cinu.org.mx/prensa/eventos/unctadxi/cp4.htm |Example.Comments=escapar de la trampa de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La educación debe ser un instrumento de salida a la trampa de la pobreza |Example.Gloss=the education should be an instrument of exit to the trap of the poverty |Example.English translation=Education should be a tool to get out of the trap of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://noticias.terra.com.mx/mexico/sergio-sarmiento-jaque-mate-evaluacion,8714f7959efcd310VgnVCM5000009ccceb0aRCRD.html |Example.Comments=la trampa de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Pero sobre todo, una reforma de esta magnitud haría a los mexicanos mucho más libres al quitarles las cadenas de la pobreza y la indignidad. |Example.Gloss=But above all a reform of this magnitude would-make to the Mexicans much more free to remove the chains of the poverty and the indignity |Example.English translation=But above all, a reform of this magnitude would make Mexicans much freer to remove the chains of poverty and indignity. |Example.Provenance=http://www.cronica.com.mx/notas/2007/306463.html |Example.Comments=quitarles las cadenas de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El funcionario municipal recalcó que la promoción del desarrollo y la dignidad humana, es otro de los objetivos que persigue el Gobierno de Díaz Brown con la instalación de un Centro Hábitat en Cajeme, el cual rompe las cadenas de la pobreza extrema a través de una serie de mecanismos como talleres de capacitación, atención psicológica, entre otros. |Example.Gloss=the functionary municipal emphasized that the promotion of-the development and the dignity human is other of the objectives that pursues the government of Díaz Brown with the installation of a Center Habitat in Cajeme the which breaks the chains of the poverty extreme by way of a series of mechanisms like workshops of training attention psychological among others |Example.English translation=The municipal functionary emphasized that the promotion of development and human dignity is another objective that Díaz Brown's government is pursuing with the installation of a Habitat Center in Cajeme, which breaks the chains of extreme poverty through a series of mechanisms like training workshops, psychological help, and others. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elregionaldesonora.com.mx/noticia/28636 |Example.Comments=rompe las cadenas de la pobreza extrema }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Según las cifras del censo, el número de hispanos que han quedado atrapados en la pobreza asciende a poco más de 13 millones. |Example.Gloss=according-to the figures of-the census the number of Hispanics that have remained trapped in the poverty rises to little more than 13 million |Example.English translation=According to census figures, the number of Hispanics that have remained trapped in poverty has risen to just over 13 million. |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/internacional/74273.html |Example.Comments=atrapados en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El resultado es que la cantidad de jóvenes atrapados en la pobreza laboral ha crecido, y que el círculo de la pobreza laboral persistirá por lo menos otra generación. |Example.Gloss=The result is that the quantity of youths trapped in the poverty working has grown and that the circle of the poverty working will-persist for the least other generation. |Example.English translation=The result is that the number of youths trapped in working poverty has grown, and that the circle of working poverty will persist for at least another generation. |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadaguerrero.com.mx/2010/08/15/index.php?section=opinion&article=002a1soc |Example.Comments=atrapados en la pobreza laboral }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

resultado es que la cantidad de jóvenes atrapados en la pobreza laboral ha crecido, y que el círculo de la pobreza laboral persistirá por lo menos otra generación. |Example.Gloss=The result is that the quantity of youths trapped in the poverty working has grown and that the circle of the poverty working will-persist for the least other generation. |Example.English translation=The result is that the number of youths trapped in working poverty has grown, and that the circle of working poverty will persist for at least another generation. |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadaguerrero.com.mx/2010/08/15/index.php?section=opinion&article=002a1soc |Example.Comments=atrapados en la pobreza laboral }} |Entered by=Joe |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

social del Gobierno del Cambio tiene un carácter integral, pues no se limita a atacar los síntomas de la pobreza, sino que busca, ante todo, eliminar sus causas. |Example.Gloss=Fox affirmed that the policy social of-the Government of-the Change has a character integral since not refl limit to attack the symptoms of the poverty but-rather that searches before all eliminate its causes |Example.English translation=Fox affirmed that the social policy of the Government of Charge has an integral character, since it's not limited to attacking the symptoms of poverty, but rather it seeks, before all else, to eliminate its causes. |Example.Provenance=http://www.cronica.com.mx/notas/2003/70539.html |Example.Comments=atacar los síntomas de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Por otra parte, siguen tercos en mantener los programas asistencialistas que solamente alivian algunos síntomas de la pobreza pero no la curan. |Example.Gloss=for other part they-follow stubborn in maintain the programs assistence that only alleviate some symptoms of the poverty but not it cure |Example.English translation=In another way, they remain stubborn in maintaining assistance programs that only alleviate some symptoms of poverty but don't cure it. |Example.Gloss=the diagnosis phenomenic attends to the symptoms of the poverty that are basically shortages of food health education among many others |Example.English translation=The phenomenic {{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=ALIANZAS |Target schema=AMISTADES |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Durante una cena de Estado que ofreció al mandatario de México, Felipe Calderón, el presidente de Estados Unidos, Barack Obama, dejó patente la relación de amistad y de socio pleno que une a ambas naciones. |Example.Gloss=During a dinner of State that offered to.the leader of Mexico Felipe Calderón the president of States United Barack Obama left obvious the relation of friendship and of partner full that joins to both nations |Example.English translation=During a State dinner that featured the president of Mexico, Felipe Calderón, President of the United States, Barack Obama made clear the relation of friendship and full partnership that binds the two nations. |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/presidencia/2010/05/19/obama-calderon-refrendan-amistad-suenos }} |Entered by=Oana, Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=ALIANZAS |Target schema=AMISTADES |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Durante una cena de Estado que ofreció al mandatario de México, Felipe Calderón, el presidente de Estados Unidos, Barack Obama, dejó patente la relación de amistad y de socio pleno que une a ambas naciones. |Example.Gloss=During a dinner of State that offered to.the leader of Mexico Felipe Calderón the president of States United Barack Obama left obvious the relation of friendship and of partner full that joins to both nations |Example.English translation=During a State dinner that featured the president of Mexico, Felipe Calderón, President of the United States, Barack Obama made clear the relation of friendship and full partnership that binds the two nations. |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/presidencia/2010/05/19/obama-calderon-refrendan-amistad-suenos }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=México reafirmó los lazos de amistad con naciones como Francia, Alemania, Estados Unidos, Japón, Colombia y España por medio de una serie de exposiciones organizadas por el Instituto Nacional de Antropología e Historia (INAH). |Example.Gloss=Mexico reaffirmed the bonds of friendship with nations like France Germany United States Japan Colombia and Spain through means of a series of exhibitions organized by the Institute National of Anthropology and History (INAH) |Example.English translation=Mexico reaffirmed the bonds of friendship with countries such as France, Germany, United States, Japan, Colombia and Spain through a series of exhibitions organized by the National Institute of anthropology and history (INAH). |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/entretenimiento/2011/12/28/exhiben-cultura-maya-colombia }} |Entered by=Oana, Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=difficulties are burdens |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Carga |Target schema=Acción |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La culpa no es lo mismo que la responsabilidad la culpa pesa sobre aquellos que no cumplieron su cometido e incluso sobre los que no tienen que ver con ello, pero no resuelve nada ... |Example.Gloss=the guilt not is the same as the responsibility the guilt weighs over those that not completed their task and including over those that not have to see with it but not resolves nothing |Example.English translation=Guilt is not the same as responsibility; guilt weighs on those that fail to complete their tasks, and even on those that have nothing to do with it, but it doesn't solve anything ... |Example.Provenance=http://www.up.edu.mx/files_HTMLObject/file/Empresariales%20UP%20(Cd_%20de%20M%C3%A9xico)/Revista%20Vision%20Empresarial/ECEE_30_2010.pdf |Example.Comments="la culpa pesa" (note original text has semicolon after "responsabilidad" but this seems to cause it to display incorrectly on master list) }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DIFFICULTIES ARE BURDENS |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=difficulties are burdens |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Carga |Target schema=Acción |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La culpa no es lo mismo que la responsabilidad la culpa pesa sobre aquellos que no cumplieron su cometido e incluso sobre los que no tienen que ver con ello, pero no resuelve nada ... |Example.Gloss=the guilt not is the same as the responsibility the guilt weighs over those that not completed their task and including over those that not have to see with it but not resolves nothing |Example.English translation=Guilt is not the same as responsibility; guilt weighs on those that fail to complete their tasks, and even on those that have nothing to do with it, but it doesn't solve anything ... |Example.Provenance=http://www.up.edu.mx/files_HTMLObject/file/Empresariales%20UP%20(Cd_%20de%20M%C3%A9xico)/Revista%20Vision%20Empresarial/ECEE_30_2010.pdf |Example.Comments="la culpa pesa" (note original text has semicolon after "responsabilidad" but this seems to cause it to display incorrectly on master list) }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Hoy el alumno tiene una carga pesada de materias, lo que provoca su dispersión en un mar de conocimientos |Example.Gloss=today the student has a load heavy of subjects that which provokes their dispersion in a sea of knowledge |Example.English translation=Today, students carry a heavy load of subject matter, which stimulates their immersion in a sea of knowledge. |Example.Provenance=http://gaceta.udg.mx/Hemeroteca/paginas/125/10-125.pdf |Example.Comments="una carga pesada de materias" }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DIFFICULTIES ARE BURDENS |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=difficulties are burdens |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Carga |Target schema=Acción |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La culpa no es lo mismo que la responsabilidad la culpa pesa sobre aquellos que no cumplieron su cometido e incluso sobre los que no tienen que ver con ello, pero no resuelve nada ... |Example.Gloss=the guilt not is the same as the responsibility the guilt weighs over those that not completed their task and including over those that not have to see with it but not resolves nothing |Example.English translation=Guilt is not the same as responsibility; guilt weighs on those that fail to complete their tasks, and even on those that have nothing to do with it, but it doesn't solve anything ... |Example.Provenance=http://www.up.edu.mx/files_HTMLObject/file/Empresariales%20UP%20(Cd_%20de%20M%C3%A9xico)/Revista%20Vision%20Empresarial/ECEE_30_2010.pdf |Example.Comments="la culpa pesa" (note original text has semicolon after "responsabilidad" but this seems to cause it to display incorrectly on master list) }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Hoy el alumno tiene una carga pesada de materias, lo que provoca su dispersión en un mar de conocimientos |Example.Gloss=today the student has a load heavy of subjects that which provokes their dispersion in a sea of knowledge |Example.English translation=Today, students carry a heavy load of subject matter, which stimulates their immersion in a sea of knowledge. |Example.Provenance=http://gaceta.udg.mx/Hemeroteca/paginas/125/10-125.pdf |Example.Comments="una carga pesada de materias" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La vida es toda ella explosión; hay alegría pero también, lo sabemos, lleva consigo una carga pesada de dolor. |Example.Gloss=the life is all 3sg.f explosion there-is happiness but also it we-know brings with-it a burden heavy of pain |Example.English translation=Life is an explosion; there's happiness but also, we know, it carries with it a heavy load of pain. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vanguardia.com.mx/xstatic/vanguardia/mobile/template/vmobiledetalle.aspx?intId=624611 }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DIFFICULTIES ARE BURDENS |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=difficulties are burdens |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Carga |Target schema=Acción |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La culpa no es lo mismo que la responsabilidad la culpa pesa sobre aquellos que no cumplieron su cometido e incluso sobre los que no tienen que ver con ello, pero no resuelve nada ... |Example.Gloss=the guilt not is the same as the responsibility the guilt weighs over those that not completed their task and including over those that not have to see with it but not resolves nothing |Example.English translation=Guilt is not the same as responsibility; {{Metaphor |Name gloss=less is down |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=MENOS ES ABAJO }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Cantidad |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Cayó 1.1% la producción industrial de México en diciembre |Example.Gloss=Fell 1.1% the production industrial of Mexico in December |Example.English translation=Industrial production in Mexico fell 1.1% in December. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elperiodicodemexico.com/nota.php?id=657819&sec=Nacional-Economia }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=No cabe duda de que la principal causa que la pobreza no haya bajado es por la falta de crecimiento económico alto y sostenido. |Example.Gloss=no possible doubt of that the principal cause that the poverty no have lowered is by the lack of growth economic high and sustained |Example.English translation=There is no doubt that the main cause that poverty has not declined is due to the lack of high and sustained economic growth. |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/foro-economico/2012/11/25/combate-pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish }} |Entered by=Joe, Karie |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=LESS IS DOWN |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=difficulties legislative are burdens |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=DIFICULTADES LEGISLATIVAS SON CARGAS }}{{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=DIFICULTADES SON CARGAS }} |Source schema=Cargas físicas |Target schema=Dificultades |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text= |Example.Gloss= |Example.English translation= |Example.Provenance= |Example.Annotation= |Example.Comments= }} |Entered by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=difficulties legislative are burdens |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=DIFICULTADES LEGISLATIVAS SON CARGAS }}{{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=DIFICULTADES SON CARGAS }} |Source schema=Cargas físicas |Target schema=Dificultades |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Claramente, el crecimiento ha sido decepcionante desde el año pasado, donde las dificultades de los legisladores para arribar a un acuerdo en materia presupuestaria, se han convertido en un lastre para la recuperación económica, aunque el ritmo de las contrataciones se mantuvo prácticamente inalterado. |Example.Gloss=clearly, the growth has been disappointing since the year past, where the difficulties of the legislators to arrive at an agreement on matter budgetary, itself has turned into a ballast to the recovery economic, although the rhythm of the hirings was kept practically unaltered |Example.English translation="Clearly, growth has been disappointing since last year, where the difficulties of legislators to arrive at an agreement on budgetary matters, has become a drag on the economic recovery, even though the pace of hiring remained virtually unchanged." |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/adp/2013/08/01/que-mirando-fed |Example.Annotation="dificultades de los legisladores ... un lastre" }} |Entered by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=ability to.evaluate poverty is ability to.see |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=PODER EVALUAR POBREZA ES PODER VER }} |Family=Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Ver |Target schema=Saber |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=PODER EVALUAR ES PODER VER }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Esta historia de éxito contempla el financiamiento de programas y proyectos con miras a disminuir la pobreza... |Example.Gloss=this story of success provides.for the funding of programs and projects with a.view at reducing the poverty |Example.English translation="This success story provides for the funding of programs and projects aimed at reducing poverty..." |Example.Provenance=http://www.iadb.org/es/paises/mexico/un-vistazo-al-bid-en-mexico,1097.html |Example.Comments="proyectos con miras a disminuir la pobreza" - "mira a" is a common idiomatic phrase meaning 'to aim at' }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=means are paths |Aliases= |Family=Metáforas de la Estructura del Evento, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Movimiento |Target schema=Acción |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=ACCIÓN ES DESPLAZAMIENTO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=... las izquierdas, como siempre, se destruyen por la misma vía que conocen a ojos cerrados: su fragmentación histórica. |Example.Gloss=... the leftists as always refl destroy by the same path that they-know at eyes closed their fragmentation historic |Example.English translation=... leftists, as always, destroy themselves by the same path they know with their eyes closed: their historical fragmentation. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2013/03/05/opinion/020a2pol }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=MEANS ARE PATHS |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=understanding is seeing |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Ver |Target schema=Comprender |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments={{Entailment |Entailment.Entailed metaphors=PODER COMPRENDER ES PODER VER }}{{Entailment |Entailment.Entailed metaphors=POSICIONARSE PARA COMPRENDER ES POSICIONARSE PARA VER }} |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Pero no funcionan cuando la cápsula en que se hace vivir a estos niños se vuelve tan impermeable que la venda que llega a cubrir la mirada es arrancada luego ferozmente por obra y gracia de la naturaleza humana misma, mostrando así el rostro más oscuro y triste del hombre. |Example.Gloss=but not function when the capsule in which one makes live to these children refl becomes so impermeable that the blindfold that comes to cover the gaze is torn-off later ferociously by hand and thanks to the nature human same showing like-this the face most dark and sad of man |Example.English translation=But this doesn't work when the capsule that one makes their children live in becomes so impermeable that the blindfold covering their eyes is torn off later, ferociously and by force, thanks to human nature displaying the very darkest and saddest face of man. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vanguardia.com.mx/xstatic/vanguardia/mobile/template/vmobiledetalle.aspx?intId=624611 }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=UNDERSTANDING IS SEEING |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=understanding is seeing |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Ver |Target schema=Comprender |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments={{Entailment |Entailment.Entailed metaphors=PODER COMPRENDER ES PODER VER }}{{Entailment |Entailment.Entailed metaphors=POSICIONARSE PARA COMPRENDER ES POSICIONARSE PARA VER }} |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Pero no funcionan cuando la cápsula en que se hace vivir a estos niños se vuelve tan impermeable que la venda que llega a cubrir la mirada es arrancada luego ferozmente por obra y gracia de la naturaleza humana misma, mostrando así el rostro más oscuro y triste del hombre. |Example.Gloss=but not function when the capsule in which one makes live to these children refl becomes so impermeable that the blindfold that comes to cover the gaze is torn-off later ferociously by hand and thanks to the nature human same showing like-this the face most dark and sad of man |Example.English translation=But this doesn't work when the capsule that one makes their children live in becomes so impermeable that the blindfold covering their eyes is torn off later, ferociously and by force, thanks to human nature displaying the very darkest and saddest face of man. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vanguardia.com.mx/xstatic/vanguardia/mobile/template/vmobiledetalle.aspx?intId=624611 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El mío esta en muy buenas condiciones y sé que haría feliz a alguien más, no veo el punto de conservarlo por años y años para ver si lo usa mi hija en un futuro. |Example.Gloss=the mine is in very good condition and I-know that it-would-make happy to someone more not I-see the point of conserve-it for years and years to see if it uses my daughter in a future |Example.English translation=Mine is in very good condition and I know that it would make someone else happy. I don't see the point of keeping it for years and years to see if my daughter will use it in the future. |Example.Provenance=http://www.terra.com.mx/cine/articulo/1123181/Robert+Pattinson+cambia+su+look+despeinado+para+Cosmopolis.htm |Example.Comments="no veo el punto" - edited for orthography }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=UNDERSTANDING IS SEEING |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=understanding is seeing |Aliases= |Family=Metáforas de Cognición, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Ver |Target schema=Comprender |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments={{Entailment |Entailment.Entailed metaphors=PODER COMPRENDER ES PODER VER }}{{Entailment |Entailment.Entailed metaphors=POSICIONARSE PARA COMPRENDER ES POSICIONARSE PARA VER }} |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Pero no funcionan cuando la cápsula en que se hace vivir a estos niños se vuelve tan impermeable que la venda que llega a cubrir la mirada es arrancada luego ferozmente por obra y gracia de la naturaleza humana misma, mostrando así el rostro más oscuro y triste del hombre. |Example.Gloss=but not function when the capsule in which one makes live to these children refl becomes so impermeable that the blindfold that comes to cover the gaze is torn-off later ferociously by hand and thanks to the nature human same showing like-this the face most dark and sad of man |Example.English translation=But this doesn't work when the capsule that one makes their children live in becomes so impermeable that the blindfold covering their eyes is torn off later, ferociously and by force, thanks to human nature displaying the very darkest and saddest face of man. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vanguardia.com.mx/xstatic/vanguardia/mobile/template/vmobiledetalle.aspx?intId=624611 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El mío esta en muy buenas condiciones y sé que haría feliz a alguien más, no veo el punto de conservarlo por años y años para ver si lo usa mi hija en un futuro. |Example.Gloss=the mine is in very good condition and I-know that it-would-make happy to someone more not I-see the point of conserve-it for years and years to see if it uses my daughter in a future |Example.English translation=Mine is in very good condition and I know that it would make someone else happy. I don't see the point of keeping it for years and years to see if my daughter will use it in the future. |Example.Provenance=http://www.terra.com.mx/cine/articulo/1123181/Robert+Pattinson+cambia+su+look+despeinado+para+Cosmopolis.htm |Example.Comments="no veo el punto" - edited for orthography }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=UNDERSTANDING IS SEEING |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=action.rate of governing of progress es motion.speed |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ACCIÓN.TASA DE GOBERNANTE DE PROGRESSO ES MOVIMIENTO.VELOCIDAD }} |Tags=mapping |Family=Gobernación, |Metaphor Level=General |Source schema=Movimiento |Target schema=Acción gobernante |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Por lo anterior, la OCDE instó a México para avanzar en materia educativa con mayor velocidad e implementar políticas específicas que estas permitan superar el retraso que se ha ido acumulando. |Example.Gloss=By it previous, the OCDE urged to Mexico for to.advance in matters educational with greater speed and to.implement policies specific that are allow to.overcome the delay that it has been accumulating |Example.English translation=Therefore, the OECD urged Mexico to advance education with greater speed and implement specific policies to these in order to overcome the delay that has been accumulating. |Example.Provenance=http://educacionadebate.org/39278/crece-rezago-educativo-y-aumenta-numero-de-ninis-ocde/ |Example.Comments="para avanzar en materia educativa con mayor velocidad" }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=GOVERNING ACTION.RATE OF PROGRESS IS MOTION.SPEED |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=can evaluate is can see |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=PODER EVALUAR ES PODER VER }} |Family=Metáforas de Mente |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Ver |Target schema=Evaluación |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=PODER COMPRENDER ES PODER VER }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=SABER ES VER }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Podemos decir que en un mundo cada vez más cambiante y global, la educación permite reconocer y apreciar lo que somos como nación. Por tanto, es indispensable mirar hacia afuera sin dejar de mirar hacia adentro. |Example.Gloss=We.can say that in a world each time more changing and global, the education allows to.recognize and appreciate it that we.are as a.nation. Therefore, it is essential to look outwards while still looking inwards. |Example.Provenance=http://www.sinectica.iteso.mx/assets/files/articulos/13_los_valores_del_sistema_educativo_mexicano_en_los_programas_de_estudio.pdf |Example.Comments="mirar hacia afuera", "mirar hacia adentro" }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ABILITY TO EVALUATE IS ABILITY TO SEE |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is an object physical complex |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=DEMOCRACIA ES UN OBJETO }}{{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=DEMOCRACIA ES UN OBJETO FÍSICO }} |Family=Metáforas de Democracia, |Source schema=Objeto físico complejo |Target schema=Democracia |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La construcción de la democracia |Example.Gloss=the construction of the democracy |Example.English translation="The construction of democracy" |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/nacion/139441.html |Example.Annotation="construcción de la democracia" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Una democracia se construye con opciones, por ello, México requiere nuevas alternativas y propuestas que permitan alcanzar el máximo histórico que es, consolidar nuestra democracia. |Example.Gloss=a democracy refl. constructed with options because this Mexico requires new alternatives and proposals that permit to.acheive the maximum historical that is to.consolidate our democracy |Example.English translation="A democracy is built with options, therefore, Mexico requires new alternatives and proposals to achieve the record high that is, consolidating our democracy." |Example.Provenance=http://www.milenio.com/firmas/alfredo_alcala_montano/Mexico-dividido-izquierda-derecha_18_194560604.html |Example.Annotation="una democracia se construye" }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=Enfermedad |Target schema=Crimen |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La sociedad no puede suponer que la solución a tan grave problema vendrá sin su concurso, sobre todo porque el crimen es una enfermedad que anida en su seno. |Example.Gloss=the society not can suppose that the solution to such grave problem will-come without its participation above all because the crime is a disease that nests in their bosom |Example.English translation=Society cannot suppose that the solution to such a serious problem [crime] will come without the participation of all, since crime is a disease that nests in its bosom [of society] |Example.Provenance=http://archivo.lajornadajalisco.com.mx/2008/08/25/index.php?section=opinion&article=006a1pol }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=CRIME IS A DISEASE |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El secretario general del Instituto Federal de Acceso a la Información y Protección de Datos (Ifai), Juan Pablo Guerrero Amparán, cuestiona que el Congreso pretenda fortalecer la autonomía del órgano colegiado “decapitándolo”. |Example.Gloss=The Secretary General of-the Institute Federal of Access to the Information and Protection of Data (IFAI), Juan Pablo Guerrero Amparán, questions that the Congress claims strengthen the autonomy of the collegiate body "by-decapitating-it." |Example.English translation=The Secretary General of the Federal Institute of Information Access and Data Protection (IFAI), Juan Pablo Guerrero Amparán, criticizes Congress for claiming to strengthen the autonomy of this collegiate body by "decapitating it." |Example.Provenance=http://www.elperiodicodemexico.com/nota.php?id=658115&sec=Nacional-Politica }} |Entered by=Oana |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=institutions are organisms |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=Cuerpo |Target schema=Institución |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El secretario general del Instituto Federal de Acceso a la Información y Protección de Datos (Ifai), Juan Pablo Guerrero Amparán, cuestiona que el Congreso pretenda fortalecer la autonomía del órgano colegiado “decapitándolo”. |Example.Gloss=The Secretary General of-the Institute Federal of Access to the Information and Protection of Data (IFAI), Juan Pablo Guerrero Amparán, questions that the Congress claims strengthen the autonomy of the collegiate body "by-decapitating-it." |Example.English translation=The Secretary General of the Federal Institute of Information Access and Data Protection (IFAI), Juan Pablo Guerrero Amparán, criticizes Congress for claiming to strengthen the autonomy of this collegiate body by "decapitating it." |Example.Provenance=http://www.elperiodicodemexico.com/nota.php?id=658115&sec=Nacional-Politica }} |Entered by=Oana |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=INSTITUTION IS AN ORGANISM |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

page.title: Metaphor:EMPOBRECIMIENTO CAUSADO ES MOVIMIENTO FORZADO HACIA ABAJO

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=impoverishment caused is movement forced toward down |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EMPOBRECIMIENTO CAUSADO ES MOVIMIENTO FORZADO HAC...»

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=impoverishment caused is movement forced toward down |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EMPOBRECIMIENTO CAUSADO ES MOVIMIENTO FORZADO HACIA ABAJO }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Movimiento |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=EMPOBRECIMIENTO ES MOVIMIENTO HACIA ABAJO }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=CAMBIO CAUSADO ES MOVIMIENTO FORZADO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Los géneros creados por la televisión en México, musicales o de humor, dramáticos o noticiosos, parecerían, para alimentar teorías conspirativas, diseñados, creados e implementados desde hace mucho con el propósito de idiotizar al grueso de una población a la que paulatinamente se ha ido orillando al peldaño siguiente en una siempre descendiente escalera socioeconómica: la clase alta se volvió media, la media popular, la popular simplemente pobre y la inmensa mayoría de gente pobre se volvió miserable por millones. |Example.Gloss=The genres created by the television in Mexico musical or of humor drama or news appears to feed theories conspiratorial designed created and implemented since ago much with the goal of make-idiots to-the thick of a population to which that slowly refl has been forcing to-the rung next in an always descending ladder socioeconomic the class high refl turns middle the middle popular the popular simply poor and the immense majority of people poor refl turn miserable by millions. |Example.English translation=The genres of Mexican television, musical or comedy, drama or news, seems--to feed conspiracy theories--designed, created, and implemented since long ago with the goal of making idiots out of the bulk of a population that has been slowly forced down to the next rung in an always-descending socioeconomic ladder: the upper class becomes middle, the middle becomes working class, the working class simply poor, and the vast majority of poor people become miserable by the millions. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2012/11/18/sem-moch.html |Example.Comments=orillando al peldaño siguiente en una siempre descendiente escalera socioeconómica }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Alimentos caros hunden en la pobreza a 44 millones de personas |Example.Gloss=Food expensive sinks in the poverty to 44 millions of people |Example.English translation=Expensive food sinks 44 million people into poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2011/02/16/economia/028n1eco |Example.Comments=hunden en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Los embarazos y la violencia doméstica, sexual y en la escuela son barreras que hunden en la pobreza e impiden el desarrollo pleno de millones de niñas y adolescentes en América Latina y el Caribe, alertó un estudio divulgado hoy por Plan Internacional. |Example.Gloss=the pregnancies and the violence domestic sexual and in the school are barriers that sink in the poverty and impede the development full of millions of girls and adolescents in America Latin and the Caribbean alerted a study released today by Plan International |Example.English translation=Pregnancy and domestic, sexual, and school violence are barriers that impede full development and sink millions of girl children and adolescentes in poverty in Latin America and the Caribbean, a study released today by Plan International warned. |Example.Provenance=http://periodicodigital.com.mx/notas/ninas_y_adolescentes_enfrentan_barreras_que_las_hunden_en_la_pobreza |Example.Comments=hunden en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza que vive en el olvido, con los desgarradores contrastes entre el México de arriba y sus sueños de desarrollo y el México de abajo y su lucha cotidiana por sobrevivir. |Example.Gloss=Us submerge in the abyss of the poverty that lives in the forgetting with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico of above and their dreams of development and the Mexico of below and their struggle daily to survive. |Example.English translation=We are submerged in the abyss of poverty that lives forgotten, with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico on top and their dreams of development and the Mexico at the bottom and their daily struggle to survive. |Example.Provenance=http://ladobe.com.mx/2012/03/mexico-rebelde-de-john-gibler/ |Example.Comments=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El aumento desmedido en los precios de los productos básicos no ha hecho más que hundir a más familias mexicanas en el abismo de la pobreza y la carencia de beneficios. |Example.Gloss=the augment disproportionate in the prices of the products basic not has done more than sink to more families Mexican in the abyss of the poverty and the lack of benefits |Example.English translation=The disproportionate increase in the prices of basic products has done nothing more than sink more Mexican families into the abyss of poverty and the lack of benefits. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ptdiputados.org.mx/intervencion.php?id=3 }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

poor, and the vast majority of poor people become miserable by the millions. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2012/11/18/sem-moch.html |Example.Comments=orillando al peldaño siguiente en una siempre descendiente escalera socioeconómica }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Alimentos caros hunden en la pobreza a 44 millones de personas |Example.Gloss=Food expensive sinks in the poverty to 44 millions of people |Example.English translation=Expensive food sinks 44 million people into poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2011/02/16/economia/028n1eco |Example.Comments=hunden en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Los embarazos y la violencia doméstica, sexual y en la escuela son barreras que hunden en la pobreza e impiden el desarrollo pleno de millones de niñas y adolescentes en América Latina y el Caribe, alertó un estudio divulgado hoy por Plan Internacional. |Example.Gloss=the pregnancies and the violence domestic sexual and in the school are barriers that sink in the poverty and impede the development full of millions of girls and adolescents in America Latin and the Caribbean alerted a study released today by Plan International |Example.English translation=Pregnancy and domestic, sexual, and school violence are barriers that impede full development and sink millions of girl children and adolescentes in poverty in Latin America and the Caribbean, a study released today by Plan International warned. |Example.Provenance=http://periodicodigital.com.mx/notas/ninas_y_adolescentes_enfrentan_barreras_que_las_hunden_en_la_pobreza |Example.Comments=hunden en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza que vive en el olvido, con los desgarradores contrastes entre el México de arriba y sus sueños de desarrollo y el México de abajo y su lucha cotidiana por sobrevivir. |Example.Gloss=Us submerge in the abyss of the poverty that lives in the forgetting with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico of above and their dreams of development and the Mexico of below and their struggle daily to survive. |Example.English translation=We are submerged in the abyss of poverty that lives forgotten, with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico on top and their dreams of development and the Mexico at the bottom and their daily struggle to survive. |Example.Provenance=http://ladobe.com.mx/2012/03/mexico-rebelde-de-john-gibler/ |Example.Comments=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El aumento desmedido en los precios de los productos básicos no ha hecho más que hundir a más familias mexicanas en el abismo de la pobreza y la carencia de beneficios. |Example.Gloss=the augment disproportionate in the prices of the products basic not has done more than sink to more families Mexican in the abyss of the poverty and the lack of benefits |Example.English translation=The disproportionate increase in the prices of basic products has done nothing more than sink more Mexican families into the abyss of poverty and the lack of benefits. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ptdiputados.org.mx/intervencion.php?id=3 |Example.Comments=el abismo de la pobreza }} |Entered by=Joe |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

translation=In another way, they remain stubborn in maintaining assistance programs that only alleviate some symptoms of poverty but don't cure it. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elreto.com.mx/articulos/?method=una&idarticulo=44029 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La pobreza es una enfermedad y la receta se llama desarrollo social, educación y promoción de la salud. |Example.Gloss=the poverty is a disease and the prescription refl call development social education and promotion of the health |Example.English translation=Poverty is a disease, and the prescription is called development, social education, and promotion of health. |Example.Provenance=http://www.correo-gto.com.mx/nacional/36702-la-pobreza-una-enfermedad-que-aqueja-a-mexico.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=En este contexto, el funcionario indicó que más allá de tratar la pobreza alimentaria, la cual se presenta cuando la población no cuenta con los recursos para cubrir las comidas que requiere, lo que se debe de combatir es la inseguridad alimentaria, que se da no solo por la disminución de ingresos, sino que no hay disposición de los alimentos, pues se ubican en zonas altamente marginadas y dispersas, que dificultan su obtención. |Example.Gloss=in this context the official indicated that more beyond of treat the poverty alimentary that which refl presents when the population not count with the resources to cover the foods that requires that which refl must of combat is the insecurity alimentary that refl gives not only by the decrease in incomes but rather that not there-is availability of the foods sense refl locate in zones highly marginalized and disperse that makes-difficult its obtaining |Example.English translation=In this context, the official indicated that, beyond just treating nutritional poverty, which shows up when the population lacks resources to afford the food they require, it is necessary to combat nutritional insecurity, which is caused not just by lowering incomes but also because food is not available, since they are located in highly marginal and disperse regions, and it is difficult to acquire. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ultra.com.mx/noticias/puebla/Local/69279-reunion-para-comenzar-el-programa-cruzada-por-el-hambre-.html |Example.Comments=tratar la pobreza alimentaria }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=improve the state economic is go-out of a place undesireable |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO ES SALIR DE UN LUGAR and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=CAMBIOS SON MOVIMIENTOS }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UN LUGAR }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Es decir, que quienes hoy reciben un apoyo, en el futuro tengan la capacidad para salir de la pobreza, a partir del fortalecimiento de sus ingresos, como individuos productivos. |Example.Gloss=is say that who today receive a support in the future have the capacity to go-out of the poverty to depart from-the strengthening of their income as indidividuals productive |Example.English translation=That is to say, that those that today receive support, in the future may have the capacity to leave poverty, due to their strengthening earnings as productive individuals. |Example.Provenance=http://www.presidencia.gob.mx/articulos-prensa/es-momento-de-mover-a-mexico-para-hacerle-frente-a-la-pobreza-y-el-hambre-enrique-pena-nieto/ |Example.Comments=salir de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Solicitan productores de leche apoyo para salir de la pobreza |Example.Gloss=solicit producers of milk support revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is cancer |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES CÁNCER }} |Family=poverty is cancer |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor T...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is cancer |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES CÁNCER }} |Family=poverty is cancer |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Cáncer |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La actual explosión filantrópica es, así, un intento de curar el cáncer de la pobreza con paños calientes, cataplasmas y buenas intenciones. |Example.Gloss=the present explosion philanthropic is like-this an attempt to cure the cancer of the poverty with towels hot poultices and good intentions |Example.English translation=The present philanthropic explosion is, therefore, an attempt to cure the cancer of poverty with hot towels, poultices, and good intentions. |Example.Provenance=http://www.antorchacampesina.org.mx/articulos/acm/2010/acm070510.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Si bien es cierto que se viven tiempos políticos, es de esperarse que los mensajes del Presidente deriven en acciones mucho más efectivas que la pretensión de curar el cáncer de la pobreza en el país con más raquíticas despensas, cuyo objetivo pareciera más el justificar un gasto administrativo que incidir en la nutrición de los empobrecidos. |Example.Gloss=if well is certain that refl live times political is of hope that the messages of-the President derive in actions much more effective than the pretension of cure the cancer of the poverty in the country with more paltry handouts whose objective seems more the justify an expense administrative than impact in the nutrition of the impoverished |Example.English translation=Since it's true that these are political times, we can only hope that the messages of the President lead to much more effective action than pretending to cure the cancer of poverty in the country with more paltry handouts, whose objective seems more to justify administrative costs than to have any effect on the nutrition of the malnourished. |Example.Provenance=http://www.sintesis.mx/hidalgo/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=17776&catid=47:opinion-local&Itemid=71 }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

|Entered by=Joe |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is cancer |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES CÁNCER }} |Description=e.g. |Family=Metáforas de Pobreza, Metáforas de aflicciones físicas, Metáforas de pobreza como problema social, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Enfermedad |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La actual explosión filantrópica es, así, un intento de curar el cáncer de la pobreza con paños calientes, cataplasmas y buenas intenciones. |Example.Gloss=the present explosion philanthropic is like-this an attempt to cure the cancer of the poverty with towels hot poultices and good intentions |Example.English translation=The present philanthropic explosion is, therefore, an attempt to cure the cancer of poverty with hot towels, poultices, and good intentions. |Example.Provenance=http://www.antorchacampesina.org.mx/articulos/acm/2010/acm070510.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Si bien es cierto que se viven tiempos políticos, es de esperarse que los mensajes del Presidente deriven en acciones mucho más efectivas que la pretensión de curar el cáncer de la pobreza en el país con más raquíticas despensas, cuyo objetivo pareciera más el justificar un gasto administrativo que incidir en la nutrición de los empobrecidos. |Example.Gloss=if well is certain that refl live times political is of hope that the messages of-the President derive in actions much more effective than the pretension of cure the cancer of the poverty in the country with more paltry handouts whose objective seems more the justify an expense administrative than impact in the nutrition of the impoverished |Example.English translation=Since it's true that these are political times, we can only hope that the messages of the President lead to much more effective action than pretending to cure the cancer of poverty in the country with more paltry handouts, whose objective seems more to justify administrative costs than to have any effect on the nutrition of the malnourished. |Example.Provenance=http://www.sintesis.mx/hidalgo/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=17776&catid=47:opinion-local&Itemid=71 }} |Entered by=Joe |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=enrichment is movement toward up |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ENRIQUECIMIENTO ES MOVIMIENTO HACIA ARRIBA }} |Metaphor Level=General...»

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=enrichment is movement toward up |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ENRIQUECIMIENTO ES MOVIMIENTO HACIA ARRIBA }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Movimiento |Target schema=Riqueza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=CAMBIOS SON MOVIMIENTOS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La probabilidad de que su familia logre avanzar en la escalera socioeconómica, y sobre todo que llegue a los peldaños más altos, es sumamente baja. |Example.Gloss=the probability of that one's family achieves advance in the ladder socioeconomic and above all that arrives to the rungs most high es highly low |Example.English translation=The chance that one's family manages to advance on the socioeconomic ladder, and, above all, make it to the highest rungs, is very low. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oportunidadesdenegocios.mx/genericas/textoON.asp?id_noticia=6092875 |Example.Comments=los peldaños más altos }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=enrichment is movement toward up |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ENRIQUECIMIENTO ES MOVIMIENTO HACIA ARRIBA }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Movimiento |Target schema=Riqueza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=CAMBIOS SON MOVIMIENTOS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La probabilidad de que su familia logre avanzar en la escalera socioeconómica, y sobre todo que llegue a los peldaños más altos, es sumamente baja. |Example.Gloss=the probability of that one's family achieves advance in the ladder socioeconomic and above all that arrives to the rungs most high es highly low |Example.English translation=The chance that one's family manages to advance on the socioeconomic ladder, and, above all, make it to the highest rungs, is very low. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oportunidadesdenegocios.mx/genericas/textoON.asp?id_noticia=6092875 |Example.Comments=los peldaños más altos }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Se entiende por movilidad social la facilidad con la que una persona puede subir o bajar en la escalera socioeconómica. |Example.Gloss=one understands by mobility social the ease with which that a person can ascend or descend in the ladder socioeconomic |Example.English translation=What is understand by social mobility is the ease with which one can ascend or descend the socioeconomic ladder. |Example.Provenance=http://elsemanario.com.mx/revista_semanal/401_1_7_sep/nelly/ |Example.Comments=subir }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=enrichment is movement toward up |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ENRIQUECIMIENTO ES MOVIMIENTO HACIA ARRIBA }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Movimiento |Target schema=Riqueza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=CAMBIOS SON MOVIMIENTOS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La probabilidad de que su familia logre avanzar en la escalera socioeconómica, y sobre todo que llegue a los peldaños más altos, es sumamente baja. |Example.Gloss=the probability of that one's family achieves advance in the ladder socioeconomic and above all that arrives to the rungs most high es highly low |Example.English translation=The chance that one's family manages to advance on the socioeconomic ladder, and, above all, make it to the highest rungs, is very low. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oportunidadesdenegocios.mx/genericas/textoON.asp?id_noticia=6092875 |Example.Comments=los peldaños más altos }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Se entiende por movilidad social la facilidad con la que una persona puede subir o bajar en la escalera socioeconómica. |Example.Gloss=one understands by mobility social the ease with which that a person can ascend or descend in the ladder socioeconomic |Example.English translation=What is understand by social mobility is the ease with which one can ascend or descend the socioeconomic ladder. |Example.Provenance=http://elsemanario.com.mx/revista_semanal/401_1_7_sep/nelly/ |Example.Comments=subir }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Que insensibilidad! A una mujer que ha perdido el fruto de su esfuerzo de muchos años y que esta desesperada por su situación y que en su mentalidad en lugar de pedir una limosna del gobierno pide trabajo para nuevamente levantarse, se le conteste con frases de este tipo. |Example.Gloss=what insensitivity to a woman that has lost the fruit of her effort of many years and that is desperate for her situation and that in her mentality in place of request a hand-out of-the government requests job for again stand-up one her answers with phrases of this type |Example.English translation=How insensitive! To a woman who has lost the fruit of her labor of many years and that is desperate over her situation and that, in her mentality, instead of asking for a government handout, asks for a job in order to pick herself up again, and they respond to her with phrases like this. |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/notas/659000.html |Example.Comments="levantarse" User comment, edited for orthography. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Eruviel, el gran desconocido, es hoy “el hijo portento que logró levantarse de la pobreza y amasar una enorme fortuna gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo |Example.Gloss=Eruviel the great unknown is today the son prodigious that achieved stand-up from the poverty and amass an enormous fortune thanks to his work and effort |Example.English translation=Eruviel, the great unknown, is today "the prodigious son that managed to rise up from poverty and amass an enormous fortune thanks to his work and effort." |Example.Provenance=http://www.ciudadcapital.com.mx/archives/14090 |Example.Comments=levantarse de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Vida y acciones de Bernabé Macías Navarro; un personaje con atributos y características que lo distinguieron de los demás como un líder, cacique y político que logró ascender de la pobreza y marginalidad de la esfera política a la cúspide del poder. |Example.Gloss=Life and actions of Bernabé Macías Navarro a person with attributes and characteristics that him distinguished from the rest as a leader boss and politician that achieved ascend from the poverty and marginalization of the sphere political to the cusp of power |Example.English translation=Life and deeds of Bernabé Macías Navarro, a person with attributes and characteristics that distinguished him from the rest as a leader, boss and politician that managed to rise out of the poverty and marginalization of the political sphere to the cusp of power. |Example.Provenance=http://etzakutarakua.colmich.edu.mx/relaciones/indices/documentos/documentosDetalle.asp?id=546 |Example.Comments=ascender de la pobreza }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

page.title: Metaphor:TIEMPO ES EL PASO DE OBJETOS HACIA EGO

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=time is the passage of objects towards ego |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Exa...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=time is the passage of objects towards ego |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=No voy a hacer nada hasta que pasen unos días. |Example.Gloss=NEG FUT-Aux to do nothing until that pass-SUBJU some days |Example.English translation=I won't do anything until a few days go by. |Example.Provenance=Alarcon p. 286 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El tiempo pasa, nos vamos poniendo viejos. |Example.Gloss=the time passes us-Cl FUT-Aux putting old |Example.English translation=Time goes by; we get older. }} |Entered by=Oana, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=TIME IS A MOVING OBJECT |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=time is the passage of objects towards ego |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Target schema=Tiempo |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=No voy a hacer nada hasta que pasen unos días. |Example.Gloss=NEG FUT-Aux to do nothing until that pass-SUBJU some days |Example.English translation=I won't do anything until a few days go by. |Example.Provenance=Alarcon p. 286 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El tiempo pasa, nos vamos poniendo viejos. |Example.Gloss=the time passes us-Cl FUT-Aux putting old |Example.English translation=Time goes by; we get older. }} |Entered by=Oana, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=TIME IS A MOVING OBJECT |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=EMOTIONS ARE SUBSTANCES |Aliases= |Family=Metáforas de Emociones, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Sustancia |Target schema=Emoción |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Nuestro país se llenó de tristeza ... |Example.Gloss=Our country itself filled of sadness ... |Example.English translation=Our country was filled with sadness. |Example.Provenance=http://www.presidencia.gob.mx/mi-solidaridad-y-apoyo-a-victimas-de-pemex-y-familiares/ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La culpa no es lo mismo que la responsabilidad; la culpa pesa sobre aquellos que no cumplieron su cometido e incluso sobre los que no tienen que ver con ello, pero no resuelve nada ... |Example.Gloss=the guilt not is the same as the responsibility the guilt weighs over those that not completed their task and including over those that not have to see with it but not resolves nothing |Example.English translation=Guilt is not the same as responsibility; guilt weighs on those that fail to complete their tasks, and even on those that have nothing to do with it, but it doesn't solve anything ... |Example.Provenance=http://www.up.edu.mx/files_HTMLObject/file/Empresariales%20UP%20(Cd_%20de%20M%C3%A9xico)/Revista%20Vision%20Empresarial/ECEE_30_2010.pdf |Example.Comments="la culpa pesa" }} |Entered by=M.E., Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=EMOTIONS ARE SUBSTANCES |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=EMOTIONS ARE SUBSTANCES |Aliases= |Family=Metáforas de Emociones, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Sustancia |Target schema=Emoción |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Nuestro país se llenó de tristeza ... |Example.Gloss=Our country itself filled of sadness ... |Example.English translation=Our country was filled with sadness. |Example.Provenance=http://www.presidencia.gob.mx/mi-solidaridad-y-apoyo-a-victimas-de-pemex-y-familiares/ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La culpa no es lo mismo que la responsabilidad la culpa pesa sobre aquellos que no cumplieron su cometido e incluso sobre los que no tienen que ver con ello, pero no resuelve nada ... |Example.Gloss=the guilt not is the same as the responsibility the guilt weighs over those that not completed their task and including over those that not have to see with it but not resolves nothing |Example.English translation=Guilt is not the same as responsibility; guilt weighs on those that fail to complete their tasks, and even on those that have nothing to do with it, but it doesn't solve anything ... |Example.Provenance=http://www.up.edu.mx/files_HTMLObject/file/Empresariales%20UP%20(Cd_%20de%20M%C3%A9xico)/Revista%20Vision%20Empresarial/ECEE_30_2010.pdf |Example.Comments="la culpa pesa" (note original text has semicolon after "responsabilidad" but this seems to cause it to display incorrectly on master list) }} |Entered by=M.E., Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=EMOTIONS ARE SUBSTANCES |Investigated for=Spanish }}

page.title: Metaphor:EXTENSIÓN DE LA POBREZA ES EXTENSIÓN DE UNA ENFERMEDAD

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=extent of the poverty is extent of a disease |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EXTENSIÓN DE LA POBREZA ES EXTENSIÓN DE UNA ENFERMEDAD ...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=extent of the poverty is extent of a disease |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EXTENSIÓN DE LA POBREZA ES EXTENSIÓN DE UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Family=Pobreza, Gobernación, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Enfermedad |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=EXTENSIÓN DE PROBLEMAS SOCIALES ES EXTENSIÓN DE UNA ENFERMEDAD }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Ya sabemos que en nuestros países los precarios niveles educativos desembocan en una epidemia de pobreza, violencia, exclusión y marginalidad. |Example.Gloss=already we-know that in our countries the precarious levels educational flow into an epidemic of poverty violence exclusion and marginalization |Example.English translation=We know already that in our nations the precarious educational levels flow into an epidemic of poverty, violence, exclusion and marginalization. |Example.Provenance=http://www.unoinews.com.mx/la-fiesta-del-conocimiento-cautivadora-charla-de-leonardo-padron/ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La epidemia de influenza no es la única que hoy mantiene preocupada a la sociedad, pues también hay una epidemia de pobreza derivada de la crisis económica, e incluso violencia por narcotráfico, a la que se tiene que atacar con igual o más intensidad, solicitaron algunos curas de la diócesis local a las autoridades municipales y estatales. |Example.Gloss=the epidemic of flu not is the unique that today maintains worried to the society well also there-is an epidemic of poverty derived from the economic crisis and including violence by narcotraffickers to which that refl has to attack with equal or more intensity solicited some priests of the diocese local to the authorities municipal and state |Example.English translation=The flu epidemic is not the only one worrying society today. There is also an epidemic of poverty due to the economic crisis as well as drug violence, which should be attacked with as much or more intensity, some priests from the local diocese urged state and local authorities. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oem.com.mx/esto/notas/n1148257.htm }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El representante de esa ONG, Javier Verzat, -en declaraciones a Efe- subrayó la importancia de 'crear un amplio diálogo en todos los confines del mundo para que se levante completamente el tabú sobre la epidemia de la pobreza y se escuche a los que viven en ella'. |Example.Gloss=the representative of that NGO Javier Verzat in declarations to Efe underlined the importance of create a broad dialogue in all the edges of-the world for that refl lift completely the taboo over the epidemic of the poverty and refl listen to those that live in it |Example.English translation=The representative of that NGO, Javier Verzat, in declarations to Efe, highlighted the importance of "creating a broad dialogue in all corners of the world in order to totally lift the taboo about the epidemic of poverty, and listen to those that live in it." |Example.Provenance=http://www.terra.com.mx/articulo.aspx?articuloid=444946 |Example.Comments=epidemia de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Si siempre lo fue, no lo sé, pero ahora la depauperación, la pobreza, contagiosa y envolvente, se volvió peligrosa. |Example.Gloss=if always it was not it I-know but now the impoverishment the poverty contagious and consuming refl turns dangerous |Example.English translation=If it was alway like this, I don't know, but now, impoverishment, poverty, contagious and all-consuming, is becoming dangerous. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oem.com.mx/elsoldemexico/notas/n2810644.htm |Example.Comments=pobreza contagiosa }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Oaxaca, es otra entidad de sorprendente belleza arquitectónica, plagada de abundancia gastronómica y de una historia mixteca y zapoteca, y que, sin embargo, no puede evitar la pandemia de la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=Oaxaca is other entity of surprising beauty arquitectural, riddled with abundance gastronomic and of a history Mixtec and Zapotec and that without restriction not can avoid the pandemic of the poverty |Example.English translation=Oaxaca is another entity of surprising arquitectural beauty, chock full of culinary abundance and a rich Mixtec and Zapotec history and that, nevertheless, cannot avoid the pandemic of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.el-mexicano.com.mx/imprime-noticia/26026 |Example.Comments=pandemia de la pobreza }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=can know is can see |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Source schema=Ver |Target schema=Comprender |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=COMPRENDER ES VER }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Algunos padres lo logran; otros no contemplan siquiera entre sus proyectos tapar los ojos de nadie. |Example.Gloss=Some parents it achieve others don't contemplate even among their projects cover the eyes of no-one |Example.English translation=Some parents pull it off [hiding the cruel realities of the world from their children]; others don't even consider trying to cover anyone's eyes. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vanguardia.com.mx/xstatic/vanguardia/mobile/template/vmobiledetalle.aspx?intId=624611 }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=can know is can see |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Source schema=Ver |Target schema=Comprender |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=COMPRENDER ES VER }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Algunos padres lo logran; otros no contemplan siquiera entre sus proyectos tapar los ojos de nadie. |Example.Gloss=Some parents it achieve others don't contemplate even among their projects cover the eyes of no-one |Example.English translation=Some parents pull it off [hiding the cruel realities of the world from their children]; others don't even consider trying to cover anyone's eyes. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vanguardia.com.mx/xstatic/vanguardia/mobile/template/vmobiledetalle.aspx?intId=624611 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Pero no funcionan cuando la cápsula en que se hace vivir a estos niños se vuelve tan impermeable que la venda que llega a cubrir la mirada es arrancada luego ferozmente por obra y gracia de la naturaleza humana misma, mostrando así el rostro más oscuro y triste del hombre. |Example.Gloss=but not function when the capsule in which one makes live to these children refl becomes so impermeable that the blindfold that comes to cover the gaze is torn-off later ferociously by hand and thanks to the nature human same showing like-this the face most dark and sad of man |Example.English translation=But this doesn't work when the capsule that one makes their children live in becomes so impermeable that the blindfold covering their eyes is torn off later, ferociously and by force, thanks to human nature displaying the very darkest and saddest face of man. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vanguardia.com.mx/xstatic/vanguardia/mobile/template/vmobiledetalle.aspx?intId=624611 }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=life is a journey |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Viaje |Target schema=Vida |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ACTIVIDADES CON PROPÓSITO SON DESPLAZAMIENTO HACIA UNA META }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is in some target relation to |Related metaphor.Name=RELACIÓN ROMÁNTICA ES UN VIAJE }} |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Oana, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=LIFE IS A JOURNEY |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=life is a journey |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Viaje |Target schema=Vida |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ACTIVIDADES CON PROPÓSITO SON DESPLAZAMIENTO HACIA UNA META }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is in some target relation to |Related metaphor.Name=RELACIÓN ROMÁNTICA ES UN VIAJE }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Quienes van antecediendo en la ruta hacia lo desconocido van dejando sus huellas, van marcando en nosotros lo que de bueno fueron; lo generoso que se mostraron, lo amoroso con que realizaron cada acto. |Example.Gloss=Those-who go leading-the-way in the route toward the unknown go leaving their footprints go marking in us that which of good were the generous that refl showed the love with which they-realized each act |Example.English translation=Those that lead the way on the path before us leave footprints, leaving their mark on us in the virtues they had; the generosity that they showed, the love with which they carried out each act. |Example.Provenance=http://www.vanguardia.com.mx/xstatic/vanguardia/mobile/template/vmobiledetalle.aspx?intId=624611 }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=LIFE IS A JOURNEY |Investigated for=Spanish }}
