{{Metaphor |Name gloss=more is up |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Cantidad |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Uno de cada tres niños vive en la pobreza en Nueva York, un porcentaje que se eleva al 39.4% cuando se trata de latinos . . . . |Example.Gloss=One of each three children live in the poverty in New York, a percentage that itself elevates to 39.4% when one deals of latinos |Example.English translation=One out of three children live in poverty in New York City, a figure that rises to 39.4% among Latinos. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/ultimas/2013/02/13/131654106-el-39-4-de-los-ninos-latinos-de-ny-vive-en-la-pobreza-estudio/ }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=more is up |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Cantidad |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Uno de cada tres niños vive en la pobreza en Nueva York, un porcentaje que se eleva al 39.4% cuando se trata de latinos . . . . |Example.Gloss=One of each three children live in the poverty in New York, a percentage that itself elevates to 39.4% when one deals of latinos |Example.English translation=One out of three children live in poverty in New York City, a figure that rises to 39.4% among Latinos. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/ultimas/2013/02/13/131654106-el-39-4-de-los-ninos-latinos-de-ny-vive-en-la-pobreza-estudio/ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=No cabe duda de que la principal causa que la pobreza no haya bajado es por la falta de crecimiento económico alto y sostenido. |Example.Gloss=no fit doubt of that the principal cause that the poverty no have lowered is because.of the lack of growth economic high and sustained |Example.English translation=There is no doubt that the main cause that poverty has not declined is due to the lack of high and sustained economic growth. |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/foro-economico/2012/11/25/combate-pobreza }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe, Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=more is up |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Cantidad |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Uno de cada tres niños vive en la pobreza en Nueva York, un porcentaje que se eleva al 39.4% cuando se trata de latinos . . . . |Example.Gloss=One of each three children live in the poverty in New York, a percentage that itself elevates to 39.4% when one deals of latinos |Example.English translation=One out of three children live in poverty in New York City, a figure that rises to 39.4% among Latinos. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/ultimas/2013/02/13/131654106-el-39-4-de-los-ninos-latinos-de-ny-vive-en-la-pobreza-estudio/ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=No cabe duda de que la principal causa que la pobreza no haya bajado es por la falta de crecimiento económico alto y sostenido. |Example.Gloss=no possible doubt of that the principal cause that the poverty no have lowered is because.of the lack of growth economic high and sustained |Example.English translation=There is no doubt that the main cause that poverty has not declined is due to the lack of high and sustained economic growth. |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/foro-economico/2012/11/25/combate-pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe, Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=AUXILIOS PARA MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO SON CAMINOS CLAROS HACIA FUERA DE UN LUGAR |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=AUXILIOS PARA MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO SON CAMINOS CLAROS HACIA FUERA DE UN LUGAR }} |Family=Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Camino |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=AUXILIO A LA ACCIÓN ES AUXILIO AL MOVIMIENTO }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO ES SALIR DE UN LUGAR INDESEABLE }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=MEDIOS SON CAMINOS }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=SABER ES VER }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Yo vi en esa camino una forma de escapar de la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=I saw in that path a way of escape from the poverty |Example.English translation=I saw in that path a way to escape from poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsiglodetorreon.com.mx/noticia/34076.de-raices-mexicanas-el-lider-militar-en-iraq.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Educación, única vía para salir de la pobreza y corrupción |Example.Gloss=Education, unique path for go-out of the poverty and corruption |Example.English translation=Education, the only path out of poverty and corruption |Example.Provenance=http://m.udg.mx/node/3051 |Example.Comments=vía para salir de la pobreza }} |Entered by=Joe, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=AUXILIOS PARA MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO SON CAMINOS CLAROS HACIA FUERA DE UN LUGAR |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=AUXILIOS PARA MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO SON CAMINOS CLAROS HACIA FUERA DE UN LUGAR }} |Family=Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Camino |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=AUXILIO A LA ACCIÓN ES AUXILIO AL MOVIMIENTO }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO ES SALIR DE UN LUGAR INDESEABLE }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=MEDIOS SON CAMINOS }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=SABER ES VER }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Yo vi en esa camino una forma de escapar de la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=I saw in that path a way of escape from the poverty |Example.English translation=I saw in that path a way to escape from poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elsiglodetorreon.com.mx/noticia/34076.de-raices-mexicanas-el-lider-militar-en-iraq.html }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Educación, única vía para salir de la pobreza y corrupción |Example.Gloss=Education, unique path for go-out of the poverty and corruption |Example.English translation=Education, the only path out of poverty and corruption |Example.Provenance=http://m.udg.mx/node/3051 |Example.Comments=vía para salir de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Se reunió con la comunidad estudiantil de la UNAM, ¿cómo ve el sistema educativo mexicano, es un camino para salir de la pobreza y de la violencia en la que vivimos? |Example.Gloss=refl reunited with the community student of the UNAM how see the system educational Mexican is a path to go-out of the poverty and of the violence in which that we-live |Example.English translation=She met with the student community of the UNAM. How do they view the Mexican educational system? Is it a path out of the poverty and violence in which we live? |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/nacion/184372.html |Example.Comments=camino para salir de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=“El camino para salir de la pobreza es el trabajo”, dijo Somavia, quien asegura que el luchar contra la pobreza está en manos de los empleados y empleadores para crear más trabajos. |Example.Gloss=the path to go-out of the poverty is the work said Somavia who assures that the struggle against the poverty is in hands of the employees and employers to create more jobs |Example.English translation="The way out of poverty is work," said Somavia, who assures that the struggle against poverty is in the hands of the employers and employees to create more jobs. |Example.Provenance=http://www.cronica.com.mx/notas/2003/68688.html |Example.Comments=camino para salir de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Comercio promete vía para salir de la pobreza |Example.Gloss=Commerce promises path to go-out of the poverty |Example.English translation=Commerce promises a way out of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.inforural.com.mx/spip.php?article64775 |Example.Comments=vía para salir de la pobreza }} |Entered by=Joe, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is an enclosure aquatic |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES UN ENCIERRO ACUÁTICO }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor Level=Ge...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is an enclosure aquatic |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES UN ENCIERRO ACUÁTICO }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Encierro Acuático |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UN ENCIERRO AMBIENTAL }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=FRACASO ES MUERTE }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Asfixiados por el desempleo, millones de europeos se hunden en la pobreza |Example.Gloss=asphyxiated by the unemployment millions of Europeans refl drown in the poverty |Example.English translation=Suffocated by unemployment, millions of Europeans are drowning in poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://noticias.terra.com.mx/mundo/europa/asfixiados-por-el-desempleo-millones-de-europeos-se-hunden-en-la-pobreza,61ec4ab0b7f7b310VgnCLD2000000dc6eb0aRCRD.html |Example.Comments=se hunden en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Comunidades rurales se hunden en la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=Communities rural refl drown in the poverty |Example.English translation=Rural communities are drowning in poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.informativoquintanaroo.com.mx/quintana-roo/3146-comunidades-rurales-se-hunden-en-la-pobreza |Example.Comments=se hunden en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Los habitantes de esta localidad se encuentran sumergidos en la pobreza y marginación ante el beneplácito de las autoridades municipales, quienes con sus acciones y cerrazón ahuyentan posibles inversiones para la generación de fuentes de empleo, que mucha falta hace para las familias necesitadas de ser retribuidas por sus servicios. |Example.Gloss=The residents of this locality refl find submerged in the poverty and marginalization before the pleasure of the authorities municipal who with their actions and foolishness chase-away possible investments for the generation of sources of employment that much lacks make for the families in-need of being paid-back for their services. |Example.English translation=The residents of this region find themselves submerged in poverty and marginalization at the whim of municipal authorities who, with their fool-minded actions, drive away possible investments to generate sources of jobs, which are badly needed by families in need of compensation for their services. |Example.Provenance=http://www.orizabaenred.com.mx/cgi-bin/web?b=VERNOTICIA&%7Bnum%7D=12850 |Example.Comments=sumergidos en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Más de 333 mil indígenas mayas habitantes de los nueve municipios quintanarroenses continúan sumergidos en la pobreza al percibir menos 1.5 salarios mínimos (77 pesos) al día para satisfacer necesidades básicas para sobrevivir como la alimentación. |Example.Gloss=More than 333 thousand indigenous Maya residents of the nine municipalities of-Quintana-Roo continue submerged in the poverty at-the see less 1.5 wages minimum 77 pesos per day to satisfy necessities basic to survive like the nutrition |Example.English translation=More than 333,000 indigenous Maya living in the nine districts of Quintana Roo continue submerged in poverty, receiving less than the 1.5 times minimum wage (77 pesos) per day necessary to meet basic needs like nutrition. |Example.Provenance=http://www.novenet.com.mx/seccion.php?id=165536&sec=4&d=30&m=07&y=2009 |Example.Comments=sumergidos en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=¿En verdad habrá sido necesario y urgente destinar tanto dinero para la compra de los tableros electrónicos, cuando nuestro país se ahoga en la pobreza? |Example.Gloss=in truth will-have been necessary and urgent direct so-much money for the purchase of the control-panels electronic when our country refl drown in the poverty |Example.English translation=Was it really necessary and urgent to spend so much money to buy electronic voting controls when our country is drowning in poverty? |Example.Provenance=http://www.poderpolitico.com.mx/vernota.php?id=13819 |Example.Comments=nuestro país se ahoga en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Aseguró que cambiará la política económica porque la actual sólo brinda privilegios a unos cuantos, sin importar el destino del país ni los reclamos de todos un pueblo que se ahoga en la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=assured that will-change the policy economic because the present only provide privilege to some few without matter the destiny of-the country nor the needs of all the people that are drowning in poverty. |Example.English translation=He assured that he will change economic policy because the current one only privileges a small few, without regard for the future of the country or the needs of all those that are drowning in poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.terra.com.mx/presidenciables2006/articulo/177028/Rinde+AMLO+protesta+como+candidato.htm |Example.Comments=un pueblo que se ahoga en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Su padre lucha contra su propio dolor mientras trata de mantener a la familia a flote. |Example.Gloss=Their father struggles against his own pain while he-tries to keep to the family to afloat |Example.English translation=Their father struggles with his own pain while trying to keep his family afloat. |Example.Provenance=http://www.up.edu.mx/document.aspx?doc=9471 |Example.Comments=mantener a la familia a flote }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

continue submerged in poverty, receiving less than the 1.5 times minimum wage (77 pesos) per day necessary to meet basic needs like nutrition. |Example.Provenance=http://www.novenet.com.mx/seccion.php?id=165536&sec=4&d=30&m=07&y=2009 |Example.Comments=sumergidos en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=¿En verdad habrá sido necesario y urgente destinar tanto dinero para la compra de los tableros electrónicos, cuando nuestro país se ahoga en la pobreza? |Example.Gloss=in truth will-have been necessary and urgent direct so-much money for the purchase of the control-panels electronic when our country refl drown in the poverty |Example.English translation=Was it really necessary and urgent to spend so much money to buy electronic voting controls when our country is drowning in poverty? |Example.Provenance=http://www.poderpolitico.com.mx/vernota.php?id=13819 |Example.Comments=nuestro país se ahoga en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Aseguró que cambiará la política económica porque la actual sólo brinda privilegios a unos cuantos, sin importar el destino del país ni los reclamos de todos un pueblo que se ahoga en la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=assured that will-change the policy economic because the present only provide privilege to some few without matter the destiny of-the country nor the needs of all the people that are drowning in poverty. |Example.English translation=He assured that he will change economic policy because the current one only privileges a small few, without regard for the future of the country or the needs of all those that are drowning in poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.terra.com.mx/presidenciables2006/articulo/177028/Rinde+AMLO+protesta+como+candidato.htm |Example.Comments=un pueblo que se ahoga en la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Su padre lucha contra su propio dolor mientras trata de mantener a la familia a flote. |Example.Gloss=Their father struggles against his own pain while he-tries to keep to the family to afloat |Example.English translation=Their father struggles with his own pain while trying to keep his family afloat. |Example.Provenance=http://www.up.edu.mx/document.aspx?doc=9471 |Example.Comments=mantener a la familia a flote }} |Entered by=Joe |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=wealth excessive is overweight bodily |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=RIQUEZA EXCESIVA ES SOBREPESO CORPORAL }} |Family=Riqueza, |Met...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=wealth excessive is overweight bodily |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=RIQUEZA EXCESIVA ES SOBREPESO CORPORAL }} |Family=Riqueza, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Cuerpo |Target schema=Riqueza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=AVARICIA ES APETITO EXCESIVO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=No te sientas mal Francisco TC, tampoco mi comentario pasa, es solo un ejemplo mas de lo mal que es el servicio de internet en este pais, y aparte caro, insisto las empresas que ofrecen este servicio son los que se engordan de dinero" |Example.Gloss=not yourself feel bad Francisco TC neither my comment went-through is only one example more of the bad that is the service of internet in this country and apart expensive I-insist the businesses that offer this service are those that refl get-fat of money |Example.English translation=Don't feel bad, Francisco TC, my comment didn't go through either. It's just one more example of how bad the internet service is in this country, not to mention expensive. I insist that the companies offering this service are the ones getting fat on the money. |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/columnas/80558.html |Example.Comments=se engordan de dinero }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Lo que nos espera es nada mas que la hambruna y la sobrevivencia en la selva de asfalto. Mientras los ricos y poderosos se hinchan de dinero y de grasa. |Example.Gloss=what that us awaits is nothing more than the famine and the survival in the jungle of asphalt while the rich and powerful refl bloat of money and of fat |Example.English translation=What awaits us is nothing more than famine and survival in the asphalt jungle. Meanwhile the rich and powerful grow bloated on money and fat. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2012/09/05/opinion/008o1eco |Example.Comments=se hinchan de dinero }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Piensan que viven en otro lugar, en otra dimensión y por eso corrompen, ensucian, contaminan, se hinchan de billetes que nunca se van a gastar y viven en la enajenación total ... |Example.Gloss=they-think that they-live in other place in other dimension and for this corrupt dirty contaminate refl bloat of bills that never refl go to spend and live in alienation total ... |Example.English translation=They think they live in another world, another dimension, and that's why they corrupt, dirty, and contaminate the world, get bloated on bills that will never be spent and live in complete alienation ... |Example.Provenance=http://www.elregional.com.mx/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=25168:las-izquierdas-proponen&catid=45:opinion&Itemid=65 |Example.Comments=se hinchan de billetes }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Understanding is grasping |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=Asir |Target schema=Comprender |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=De ahí en adelante empecé a agarrar la onda y de verdad me empezó a interesar tanto, que pensé en dejar la carrera, |Example.Gloss=From there in forward I-began to grab the wave and of truth me began to interest so-much that I-though in leave the career |Example.English translation=From then on I started to get a handle on it, and truthfully it started to interest me so much that I thought about leaving my field of study. |Example.Provenance=http://www.revistargb.mx/portfolio/julio-juarez/ |Example.Comments="agarrar la onda" is a common Mexican idiom, "grab the wave," which means understand, comprehend. }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=UNDERSTANDING IS GRASPING |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is a machine |Aliases= |Family=Metáforas de Democracia, |Metaphor Level=General |Source schema=Máquina |Target schema=Institución democ...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is a machine |Aliases= |Family=Metáforas de Democracia, |Metaphor Level=General |Source schema=Máquina |Target schema=Institución democrática |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Quien haya tenido la paciencia de llegar hasta este punto del ensayo coincidirá conmigo en que la democracia es una máquina complicada. |Example.English translation=Anyone who has had the patience to get to this point of the trial will agree that democracy is a complicated machine. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ine.mx/documentos/DECEYEC/esferas_de_la_democracia.htm |Example.Annotation="democracia es una máquina complicada" }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEMOCRACY IS A MACHINE |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is a machine |Aliases= |Family=Metáforas de Democracia, |Metaphor Level=General |Source schema=Máquina |Target schema=Institución democrática |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Quien haya tenido la paciencia de llegar hasta este punto del ensayo coincidirá conmigo en que la democracia es una máquina complicada. |Example.English translation=Anyone who has had the patience to get to this point of the trial will agree that democracy is a complicated machine. |Example.Provenance=http://www.ine.mx/documentos/DECEYEC/esferas_de_la_democracia.htm |Example.Annotation="democracia es una máquina complicada" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La democracia es una máquina de sacar basura a la superficie mediante la libertad de expresión. |Example.English translation=Democracy is a machine for getting garbage to the surface via the freedom of expression. |Example.Provenance=http://revolucionesmx.blogspot.com/2010_04_14_archive.html |Example.Annotation=democracia es una máquina }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEMOCRACY IS A MACHINE |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is an enclosure constructed |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES UN ENCIERRO CONSTRUIDO }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Encierro |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UN LUGAR }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=LIBERTAD DE ACCIÓN ES LIBERTAD DE MOVIMIENTO |Related metaphor.Description=La pobreza limita la libertad de acción así como un encierro limita la libertad de movimiento. }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La cárcel de la pobreza los obligaba a vivir y producir, sin más recursos que el ingenio, la alegría de vivir y de lo que encuentran en el desván de la naturaleza. |Example.Gloss=the prison of the poverty them obligates to live and produce without more resources than the ingenuity the joy of living and of what that they-find in the attic of the nature |Example.English translation=The prison of poverty forces them to live and produce with nothing more than their own ingenuity, joy of living, and whatever they find in nature's attic. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/1999/10/12/oja-portazo.html |Example.Comments=cárcel de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Muchos millones de sus habitantes se han visto liberados con ello de la prisión de la pobreza perpetua. {{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is a plant |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Planta |Target schema=Ideología democrática |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Oana |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEMOCRACY IS A PLANT |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is a plant |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Planta |Target schema=Ideología democrática |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Tampoco puede la democracia florecer sin estabilidad. |Example.English translation=Nor can democracy flourish without stability. |Example.Provenance=http://fox.presidencia.gob.mx/actividades/ |Example.Annotation=“democracia florecer” }} |Entered by=Oana |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEMOCRACY IS A PLANT |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is a plant |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Planta |Target schema=Ideología democrática |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Tampoco puede la democracia florecer sin estabilidad. |Example.English translation=Nor can democracy flourish without stability. |Example.Provenance=http://fox.presidencia.gob.mx/actividades/ |Example.Annotation=“democracia florecer” }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=..., que la mejor forma de exportar la deliciosa fruta de la democracia sería. |Example.English translation=.., that the best way to export the delicious fruit of democracy would be." |Example.Provenance=http://www.diputados.gob.mx/sedia/biblio/virtual/dip/diplvii/08_glez.pdf |Example.Annotation=deliciosa fruta de la democracia }} |Entered by=Oana |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEMOCRACY IS A PLANT |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy is a plant |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Planta |Target schema=Ideología democrática |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Tampoco puede la democracia florecer sin estabilidad. |Example.English translation=Nor can democracy flourish without stability. |Example.Provenance=http://fox.presidencia.gob.mx/actividades/ |Example.Annotation=“democracia florecer” }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=..., que la mejor forma de exportar la deliciosa fruta de la democracia sería. |Example.English translation=.., that the best way to export the delicious fruit of democracy would be." |Example.Provenance=http://www.diputados.gob.mx/sedia/biblio/virtual/dip/diplvii/08_glez.pdf |Example.Annotation=deliciosa fruta de la democracia }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Pedro Prieto-Martín bautiza a este fenómeno como "la democracia marchita" y lo carácteriza como una aparente contradicción entre la victoria de la democracia entre la "menos mala de todas las formas de gobierno" y el desencanto de quienes viven en regímenes democráticos. |Example.English translation=Pedro Prieto-Martin baptizes to this phenomenon as "the withered democracy" and characterizes it as an apparent contradiction between the victory of democracy among the "least bad of all forms of government" and disenchantment of those living in democratic regimes. |Example.Provenance=http://politicacomunicada.blogspot.com/2012/03/la-reflexion-de-fernando-amosa-sobre-la.html |Example.Annotation=la democracia marchita }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish }} |Entered by=Oana |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEMOCRACY IS A PLANT |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=A este se le tiene que acompasar un acuerdo estratégico para realmente incrementar los ingresos de los estratos situados en la base de la pirámide |Example.Gloss=To this one it has to walk an accord strategic to really increase the incomes of the strata situated in the base of the pyramid. |Example.English translation=To achieve this, it is necessary to agree upon and follow a strategy that will truly increase incomes for those social strata located at the base of the pyramid. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2013/02/20/opinion/026a2pol |Example.Comments=Note: very good example of a social inequality metaphor : poverty is down, etc. }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=escalation of violence is up |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ESCALADA DE VIOLENCIA ES ARRIBA }} |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Violencia |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=En los comunicados que los organizadores catalanes distribuyeron entre los asistentes, los manifestantes consideran que cualquier acción militar de estados unidos y de la otan contra terceros países generaría una escalada de violencia a nivel internacional y provocaría más víctimas inocentes entre la población civil. |Example.Gloss=In the statements that the organizers Catalans distributed amongst the attendees, the protestors believe that any action military of states united and of the NATO against third countries would.generate an escalation of violence of level international and would.cause more victims innocent among the population civilian |Example.English translation=In the statements that the organizers Catalans were distributed among the attendees, the protesters believe that any military action in the United States and NATO against third countries would generate an escalation of violence at the international level and causing more innocent victims among the civilian population. |Example.Comments=escalada de violencia }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=to.face.up.to problems educational is to.face obstacles |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ENFRENTAR PROBLEMAS EDUCATIVOS ES ENFRENTAR OBSTÁCULOS }} |Family=Educación, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Obstáculo en el camino |Target schema=Educación |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ENFRENTAR PROBLEMAS ES ENFRENTAR OBSTÁCULOS }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=PROBLEMAS EDUCATIVOS SON OBSTÁCULOS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Peña Nieto hace historia y planta cara a la bestia negra de la educación mexicana. |Example.Gloss=Peña Nieto makes history and plants face to the beast black of the education Mexican |Example.English translation="Peña Nieto makes history and stands up to the black beast of Mexican education." |Example.Provenance=http://www.vinculocritico.com/especiales/se-dice-se-comenta/politica/mexico/enrique-pena-nieto/reforma-educativa/elba-esther-gordillo/294490 |Example.Comments="planta cara a" - popular Spanish idiom meaning "to stand up to" }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=nation that abuses of power is a bully |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Violencia |Target schema=Gobierno |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Insultos, provocaciones y acoso del gigante de la guerra, incendia la ira musulmana para después llamarse a robados cuando les logran colar una bomba donde menos se lo esperan en venganza por las muertes diarias que causan los afanes imperialistas desbordados. |Example.Gloss=insults provocations and harassment of-the giant of the war ignites the rage muslim for after call.refl to stolen when to-them achieve slip a bomb where less they it expect in vengeance for the deaths daily that cause the efforts imperialist overflowing |Example.English translation=Insults, provocation, and harassment from the warmongering giant ignites Muslim rage, only to call foul when they manage to slip a bomb where they least expect it as payback for the daily deaths caused by reckless imperialist efforts. |Example.Provenance=http://www.revistarepublica.com.mx/pragmatismo-esquizofrenico/ }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=NATIONS WHO ABUSE POWER ARE BULLIES |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is a shadow |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES UNA SOMBRA }} |Family=Metáforas de Pobreza, |Source schema=Tinieblas ...»
revision.text:
{{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is a shadow |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=POBREZA ES UNA SOMBRA }} |Family=Metáforas de Pobreza, |Source schema=Tinieblas |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text="Y en muchas comunidades a través del país, la sombra de la pobreza continua desmoralizando a nuestros compatriotas", señaló. |Example.Gloss=and in many communities across the country the shadow of the poverty continues demoralizing to our countrymen he.pointed.out |Example.English translation="'And in many communities across the country, the shadow of poverty continues demoralizing our countrymen,' he noted."
|Example.Provenance=http://elhorizonte.mx/a/noticia/421398/normal/1/24 |Example.Annotation=sombra de la pobreza }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=POVERTY IS DARKNESS |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=people exploitative are parasites |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=PERSONAS EXPLOTADORES SON PARÁSITOS }} |Family=Riqueza, Pobreza, |...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=people exploitative are parasites |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=PERSONAS EXPLOTADORES SON PARÁSITOS }} |Family=Riqueza, Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Parásito |Target schema=Persona |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=ADQUIRIR RECURSOS ES CONSUMIR COMIDA }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Ese desprecio del candidato del PAN hacia los humildes, es propio de la clase a la que pertenece: los ricos, los explotadores, los parásitos sociales, las sanguijuelas. |Example.Gloss=this disdain of-the candidate of-the PAN toward the lowly is property of the class to which that pertains the rich the exploitative the parasites social the leeches |Example.English translation=The PAN candidate's disdain for the poor is a feature of the social class to which he belongs: the rich, the exploitative, the social parasites, the leeches. |Example.Provenance=http://archivo.lajornadamichoacan.com.mx/2007/10/13/index.php?section=opinion&article=002a2pol |Example.Comments=sanguijuelas }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=functionality of system educational is verticaity |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=FUNCIONALIDAD DEL SISTEMA EDUCATIVO ES VERTICALIDAD }} |Family=Educación, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Educación |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=FUNCIONALIDAD ES VERTICALIDAD }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=SISTEMA EDUCATIVO ES UN ESTRUCTURA FÍSICA }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=De unos cinco años a la fecha, el sistema educativo ha ido decayendo hasta encontrarse actualmente por el suelo y a pocos pasos de irse al más profundo desfiladero. |Example.Gloss=of about five years to the date, the system educational has gone declining to be currently on the floor and a few steps from to.leave.from to.the more deep gorge |Example.English translation=For about five years now, the education system has declined to be currently at rock bottom and a few steps from going off the deepest ravine. |Example.Provenance=http://laexpresion.info/inicio/por-los-suelos-el-nivel-educativo/ |Example.Comments="ha ido decayendo", "por el suelo" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Que la educación publica esté por los suelos no es responsabilidad de los padres. |Example.Gloss=That the education public is on the floor not is responsibility of the parents |Example.English translation=That public education is at rock bottom is not the responsibility of the parents. |Example.Provenance=http://www.mmadrigal.com/la-educacin-por-los-suelos/ |Example.Comments="la educación publica esté por los suelos" }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=adversity economic is harm physical |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ADVERSIDAD ECONÓMICA ES DAÑO FÍSICO }} |Family=Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Daño físico |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=DAÑO PSICOLÓGICO ES DAÑO FÍSICO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Lacera la pobreza a los indígenas. |Example.Gloss=lacerates the poverty to the indigenous |Example.English translation=Poverty lacerates the indigenous. |Example.Provenance=http://www.novenet.com.mx/seccion.php?id=165536&sec=4&d=30&m=07&y=2009 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La pobreza lastima a cientos de familias en esta zona de la región de La Montaña, pero en ellas persiste el anhelo de alcanzar un mejor futuro mejor o por lo menos garantizar ya no el sustento, sino el alimento diario para sus hijos. |Example.Gloss=the poverty injures to hundreds of families in this zone of the region of La Montaña but in them persists the desire of reach a better future better or for the least guarantee already not the sustenance but-also the feeding daily for their children |Example.English translation=Poverty hurts hundreds of families in this region of La Montaña, but within those families persists the desire to achieve a better future, or at least guarantee not just minimum sustenance, but also to feed their children daily. |Example.Provenance=http://www.sinembargo.mx/02-02-2012/138732 |Example.Comments=la pobreza lastima a cientos de familias }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=En la comunidad indígena de San Juan Tepeuxila, que está enclavada en la región Cañada, la pobreza lastima y duele. |Example.Gloss=in the community indigenous of San Juan Tepeuxila that is embedded in the region Cañada the poverty injures and hurts |Example.English translation=In the indigenous community of San Juan Tepeuxila, deep within the Cañada region, poverty injures and hurts. |Example.Provenance=http://www.diariomarca.com.mx/?p=154874 |Example.Comments=la pobreza lastima y duele }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Dijo que si bien la pobreza lastima a los mexicanos, se debe reconocer que es necesaria la contribución de cada uno de los sectores para lograr sacar adelante las reformas que permitan obtener la "materia prima", es decir el dinero para inyectarlo en la educación. |Example.Gloss=said that if well the poverty injures to the Mexicans one must recognize that it-is necessary the contribution of each one of the sectors for achieve take-out forward the reforms that permit obtain the material raw is to-say the money to inject-it in the education |Example.English translation=She said that since poverty is harming the Mexican people, it must be recognized that it's necessary to contribute to every sector in order to advance the reforms that will make available the "raw material," that is to say, the money to inject into education. |Example.Provenance=http://www.cronica.com.mx/notas/2003/93943.html |Example.Comments=la pobreza lastima a los mexicanos }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Seguimos en crisis, el desempleo se incrementa, la pobreza daña a más de 50 millones de mexicanos. |Example.Gloss=we-follow in crisis the unemployment refl increment the poverty harms to more than 50 million of Mexicans |Example.English translation=We are still in crisis. Unemployment is increasing, and poverty harms more than 50 million Mexicans. |Example.Provenance=http://www.comunicacampeche.com.mx/Php/noticiacomlocal.php?id=70354 |Example.Comments=la pobreza daña a más de 50 millones de mexicanos. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Sin embargo, aclara que en México la pobreza hiere por igual a mujeres y a hombres. |Example.Gloss=without restriction clarifies that in Mexico the poverty wounds for equal to women and to men |Example.English translation=Nevertheless, she clarifies that in Mexico, poverty wounds women and men equally. |Example.Provenance=http://cimacnoticias.com.mx/node/45414 }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=impediments to improve the state economic are forces restrictive |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=IMPEDIMENTOS PARA MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO SON FUERZAS RESTRICTIVAS }} |Family=Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Fuerza física |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=DIFICULTADES SON IMPEDIMENTOS AL MOVIMIENTO }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO ES SALIR DE UN LUGAR INDESEABLE }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=CAUSAS SON FUERZAS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Es innegable que la pobreza restringe la capacidad de las personas de proponerse metas valiosas, así como de realizar estados de vida plenos. |Example.Gloss=it-is undeniable that the poverty restricts the capacity of the people of propose-themselves goals worthy like-this as of realize states of life full |Example.English translation=It is undeniable that poverty restricts people's capacity to set worthy goals, as well as realize a full life. |Example.Provenance=http://fomixcampeche.gob.mx/documentos/articulos_04/focare_04_caso_pobreza.pdf |Example.Comments=la pobreza restringe }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Así el mundo actual se enfrenta a una situación donde la creciente pobreza restringe aún más el acceso a los alimentos por parte de las mayorías, profundizando los problemas de desnutrición y hambre. |Example.Gloss=like-this the world present refl confronts to a situation where the growing poverty restricts even more the access to the foods by part of the majorities deepening the problems of malnutrition and hunger |Example.English translation=In this way, today's world confront's a situation where growing poverty further restricts access to food by the majority, deepening the problems of malnutrition and hunger. |Example.Provenance=http://archivo.lajornadajalisco.com.mx/2011/02/19/index.php?section=politica&article=008a1pol |Example.Comments=la creciente pobreza restringe }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Esto implica considerar un rango de factores que restringen a los pobres, incluyendo factores políticos, culturales y sociales. |Example.Gloss=This implies consider a range of factors that restrict to the poor including factors political cultural and social |Example.English translation=This implies considering a range of factors that restrict the poor, including political, cultural, and social factors. |Example.Provenance=http://contorno.org.mx/contorno/resources/media/pdf/RLA_VISION_AMPLIA_DESARROLLO.pdf |Example.Comments=factores que restringen a los pobres }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

page.title: Metaphor:EMPOBRECIMIENTO CAUSADO ES MOVIMIENTO FORZADO A UN LUGAR

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=impoverishment caused is movement forced to a place |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EMPOBRECIMIENTO CAUSADO ES MOVIMIENTO FORZADO A UN...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=impoverishment caused is movement forced to a place |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EMPOBRECIMIENTO CAUSADO ES MOVIMIENTO FORZADO A UN LUGAR }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Movimiento |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UN LUGAR }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=CAMBIO CAUSADO ES MOVIMIENTO FORZADO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Los biocombustibles son responsables por el 30 por ciento del incremento en los precios mundiales de los alimentos, empujando a 30 millones de personas a la pobreza, dijo el miércoles en un reporte la organización internacional Oxfam. |Example.Gloss=the biofuels are responsible for the 30 per cent of the increase in the prices world of the food pushing to 30 million of people to the poverty said the Wednesday in a report the organization international Oxfam |Example.English translation=Biofuels are responsible for 30 percent of the increase in world food prices, pushing 30 million people to poverty, said the international organization Oxfam in a report Wednesday. |Example.Provenance=http://www.terra.com.mx/articulo.aspx?articuloid=688413 |Example.Comments=empujando a 30 millones de personas a la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Sin embargo, no sólo en nuestro país, sino en muchos otros, la mayoría de la población sufre opresión económica no debido a su pereza, sino a las malas decisiones de gobernantes y líderes políticos que por su ambición y falta de sabiduría para manejar los asuntos financieros del país, llevan a la pobreza a sus gobernados y dan bienestar y ganancias económicas a unos cuantos. |Example.Gloss=without restriction not only in our country but-also in many others the majority of the population suffers oppression economic not due to their sloth but-rather to the bad decisions of governors and leaders political that for their ambition and lack of wisdom to manage the issues financial of-the country bring to the poverty to their constituents and give well-being and profit economic to some few. |Example.English translation=Nevertheless, not only in our country, but in many others, the majority of the population suffers economic oppression not due to laziness but to bad decisions on the part of governing officials and political leaders who, due to their ambition and lack of knowledge how to manage the financial issues of the country, bring their constituents to poverty and give wellbeing and economic profits to a few. |Example.Provenance=http://www.elmanana.com.mx/notas.asp?id=96426 |Example.Comments=llevan a la pobreza a sus gobernados }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Notamos, sin embargo, que aunque el proceso de globalización constituye una fuerza dinámica que puede beneficiar a todos los países, en la práctica sus beneficios se reparten muy desequilibradamente y expresamos nuestra determinación de prevenir y castigar y mitigar los efectos negativos de globalización, que llevan a la pobreza, al subdesarrollo y la exclusión social. |Example.Gloss=we-notice without restriction that although the process of globalization constitutes a force dynamic that can benefit to all the countries in the practice its benefits refl distribute very unbalanced and we-express our determination of prevent and punish and mitigate the effects negative of globalization that carry to the poverty to-the underdevelopment and the exclusion social |Example.English translation=We note, nevertheless, that even though the process of globalization constitutes a dynamic force that could benefit all nations, in practice its benefits are distributed very unequally and we express our determination to prevent, punish, and mitigate the negative effects of globalization, which lead to poverty, underdevelopment, and social exclusion. |Example.Provenance=http://fox.presidencia.gob.mx/actividades/visitaoficial/?contenido=19201 |Example.Comments=llevan a la pobreza }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

page.title: Metaphor:PREVENCIÓN DE EMPOBRECIMIENTO ES UN IMPEDIMENTO AL MOVIMIENTO HACIA ABAJO

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=prevention of impoverishment is an impediment to movement toward down |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=PREVENCIÓN DE EMPOBRECIMIENTO E...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=prevention of impoverishment is an impediment to movement toward down |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=PREVENCIÓN DE EMPOBRECIMIENTO ES UN IMPEDIMENTO AL MOVIMIENTO HACIA ABAJO }} |Family=Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Movimiento Vertical |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=EMPOBRECIMIENTO ES MOVIMIENTO HACIA ABAJO }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=PREVENCIÓN DE CAMBIO DE ESTADO ES UN IMPEDIMENTO AL MOVIMIENTO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Calderón pide crear una red de seguridad para los más pobres en México |Example.Gloss=Calderón requests create a net of safety for the most poor in Mexico |Example.English translation=Calderón called for the creation of a safety net for the poorest in Mexico. |Example.Provenance=http://www.excelsior.com.mx/2011/09/20/nacional/769512 |Example.Comments=red de seguridad }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Los más pobres entre los pobres se están quedando atrás. Es necesario que los alcancemos y los subamos a nuestro bote salvavidas. |Example.Gloss=The most poor among the poor refl are remaining behind is necessary that them we-reach and them we-raise to our both lifesaver |Example.English translation=The poorest of the poor are remaining behind. It's necessary for us to reach them and get them into our lifeboat. |Example.Provenance=http://www.cinu.mx/noticias/mundial/la-reduccion-de-la-pobreza-va/ |Example.Comments=bote salvavidas }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Diversos tipos de programas son propuestos con el fin de construir una red de seguridad para los más pobres: programas de transferencia de dinero de asistencia alimentaria, así como de trabajo público. |Example.Gloss=diverse types of programs are proposed with the end of construct a net of safety for the most poor programs of transference of money of assistance alimentary similarly as of work public |Example.English translation=A variety of programs are proposed with the goal of creating a safety net for the poorest people: programs of monetary assistance for nutrition, as well as public jobs. |Example.Provenance=http://www.scielo.org.mx/scielo.php?script=sci_arttext&pid=S0188-77422005000200007 |Example.Comments=red de seguridad }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

page.title: Metaphor:EFECTOS DE POBREZA SON HERIDAS FÍSICAS

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=effects of poverty are wounds physical |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EFECTOS DE POBREZA SON HERIDAS FÍSICAS }} |Family=Pobreza, |M...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=effects of poverty are wounds physical |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EFECTOS DE POBREZA SON HERIDAS FÍSICAS }} |Family=Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Daño físico |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text= |Example.Gloss= |Example.English translation= |Example.Provenance= |Example.Annotation= |Example.Comments= }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text= |Example.Gloss= |Example.English translation= |Example.Provenance= |Example.Annotation= |Example.Comments= }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text= |Example.Gloss= |Example.English translation= |Example.Provenance= |Example.Annotation= |Example.Comments= }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=effects of poverty are wounds physical |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EFECTOS DE POBREZA SON HERIDAS FÍSICAS }} |Family=Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Daño físico |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=ADVERSIDAD ECONÓMICA ES DAÑO FÍSICO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El accidente del jueves por la tarde vuelve a abrir las viejas heridas de la pobreza extrema y la marginación que surcan al estado de Guerrero, reabre la indignación, pero también adelanta un pronóstico inicuo: no pasará nada. |Example.Gloss=the accident of-the Thursday for the afternoon turns to open the old wounds of the poverty extreme and the marginalization that cross the state of Guerrero reopens the indignation but also advances a prognosis cruel not will-pass nothing |Example.English translation=Thursday afternoon's accident reopened the old wounds of extreme poverty and marginalization that mark the state of Guerrero, reopens the indignation, but also suggests a cruel prognosis: nothing will happen. |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadaguerrero.com.mx/2012/07/07/index.php?section=opinion&article=002o1soc |Example.Comments= vuelve a abrir las viejas heridas de la pobreza extrema }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Hoy, dijo Rossi, casi todos los países latinoamericanos han vuelto a la democracia con imperfecciones, con problemas, con dolores y turbulencias; pero también es cierto que las heridas de la pobreza siguen abiertas en la mayoría de estas naciones como 30 años atrás o aun peor, como Argentina, en espera de ver quién la salva. |Example.Gloss=today said Rossi almost all the countries Latin-American have turned to the democracy with imperfections with problems with pains and turmoils but also is true that the wounds of the poverty continue open in the majority of these nations like 30 years before or even worse like Argentina in wait of see who it saves |Example.English translation=Today, said Rossi, almost all of the Latin American nations have turned to democracy with imperfections, problems, pains and turmoils. But it's also true that in most of these nations, the wounds of poverty remain open just like 30 years ago or even worse, like Argentina, waiting to see who will save them. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2004/09/01/04an1cul.php?origen=index.html&fly=1 |Example.Comments=las heridas de la pobreza siguen abiertas }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Ideologías, movimientos bélicos y pacíficos, iniciativas y acuerdos multinacionales y más, mucho más, se ha pretendido estructurar para paliar necesidades, sin duda mucho se ha logrado, otro tanto evitado, pero la realidad nos dice que la gran mayoría de los pueblos viven agobiados por los dolores de la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=ideologies movements warlike and peaceful initiatives and agreements multinational and more much more refl has claimed structure to palliate needs without doubt much refl has achieved other some avoided but the reality us tells that the great majority of the communities live crushed by the pains of the poverty |Example.English translation=Ideologies, militant and peaceful movements, multinational initiatives and agreements and more, much more, has been claimed to provide the structure to alleviate needs. Without doubt much has been achieved, while much has not, but reality tells us that the great majority of communities live crushed by the pains of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oem.com.mx/eloccidental/notas/n2020416.htm |Example.Comments=los pueblos viven agobiados por los dolores de la pobreza }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=effects of poverty are wounds physical |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EFECTOS DE POBREZA SON HERIDAS FÍSICAS }} |Family=Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Daño físico |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=ADVERSIDAD ECONÓMICA ES DAÑO FÍSICO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El accidente del jueves por la tarde vuelve a abrir las viejas heridas de la pobreza extrema y la marginación que surcan al estado de Guerrero, reabre la indignación, pero también adelanta un pronóstico inicuo: no pasará nada. |Example.Gloss=the accident of-the Thursday for the afternoon turns to open the old wounds of the poverty extreme and the marginalization that cross the state of Guerrero reopens the indignation but also advances a prognosis cruel not will-pass nothing |Example.English translation=Thursday afternoon's accident reopened the old wounds of extreme poverty and marginalization that mark the state of Guerrero, reopens the indignation, but also suggests a cruel prognosis: nothing will happen. |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadaguerrero.com.mx/2012/07/07/index.php?section=opinion&article=002o1soc |Example.Comments=vuelve a abrir las viejas heridas de la pobreza extrema }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Hoy, dijo Rossi, casi todos los países latinoamericanos han vuelto a la democracia con imperfecciones, con problemas, con dolores y turbulencias; pero también es cierto que las heridas de la pobreza siguen abiertas en la mayoría de estas naciones como 30 años atrás o aun peor, como Argentina, en espera de ver quién la salva. |Example.Gloss=today said Rossi almost all the countries Latin-American have turned to the democracy with imperfections with problems with pains and turmoils but also is true that the wounds of the poverty continue open in the majority of these nations like 30 years before or even worse like Argentina in wait of see who it saves |Example.English translation=Today, said Rossi, almost all of the Latin American nations have turned to democracy with imperfections, problems, pains and turmoils. But it's also true that in most of these nations, the wounds of poverty remain open just like 30 years ago or even worse, like Argentina, waiting to see who will save them. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2004/09/01/04an1cul.php?origen=index.html&fly=1 |Example.Comments=las heridas de la pobreza siguen abiertas }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Ideologías, movimientos bélicos y pacíficos, iniciativas y acuerdos multinacionales y más, mucho más, se ha pretendido estructurar para paliar necesidades, sin duda mucho se ha logrado, otro tanto evitado, pero la realidad nos dice que la gran mayoría de los pueblos viven agobiados por los dolores de la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=ideologies movements warlike and peaceful initiatives and agreements multinational and more much more refl has claimed structure to palliate needs without doubt much refl has achieved other some avoided but the reality us tells that the great majority of the communities live crushed by the pains of the poverty |Example.English translation=Ideologies, militant and peaceful movements, multinational initiatives and agreements and more, much more, has been claimed to provide the structure to alleviate needs. Without doubt much has been achieved, while much has not, but reality tells us that the great majority of communities live crushed by the pains of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oem.com.mx/eloccidental/notas/n2020416.htm |Example.Comments=los pueblos viven agobiados por los dolores de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=En forma subrepticia, la cadena televisiva introdujo a sus modelos, las más parecidas a nuestras indígenas de la sierra Tarahumara, que son morenas, ajadas de cara, con las cicatrices de la pobreza en el rostro, serias (modestas, sería lo correcto), llevando con orgullo su vestimenta clásica, con la que han transitado las mujeres serranas durante generaciones enteras. |Example.Gloss=in form surreptitious the channel television introduced to its models those most similar-in-appearance to our indigenous of the mountain-range Tarahumara that are dark-skinned haggard of face with the scars of the poverty on the face serious modest would-be the correct carrying with pride their garments classic with which that have move the women of-the-Sierra during generations entire |Example.English translation=Surreptitiously, the television channel introduced their models, those that look most similar to the indigenous people of the Tarahumara mountains, who are dark-skinned, with haggard faces, bearing the scars of poverty, stern ("modest" would be more appropriate), proudly wearing the traditional garments that women of the Sierra have worn for generations. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oem.com.mx/elmexicano/notas/n2020923.htm |Example.Comments=cicatrices de la pobreza }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=effects of poverty are wounds physical |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=EFECTOS DE POBREZA SON HERIDAS FÍSICAS }} |Family=Metáforas de Pobreza, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Daño físico |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=ADVERSIDAD ECONÓMICA ES DAÑO FÍSICO }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El accidente del jueves por la tarde vuelve a abrir las viejas heridas de la pobreza extrema y la marginación que surcan al estado de Guerrero, reabre la indignación, pero también adelanta un pronóstico inicuo: no pasará nada. |Example.Gloss=the accident of-the Thursday for the afternoon turns to open the old wounds of the poverty extreme and the marginalization that cross the state of Guerrero reopens the indignation but also advances a prognosis cruel not will-pass nothing |Example.English translation=Thursday afternoon's accident reopened the old wounds of extreme poverty and marginalization that mark the state of Guerrero, reopens the indignation, but also suggests a cruel prognosis: nothing will happen. |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadaguerrero.com.mx/2012/07/07/index.php?section=opinion&article=002o1soc |Example.Comments=vuelve a abrir las viejas heridas de la pobreza extrema }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Hoy, dijo Rossi, casi todos los países latinoamericanos han vuelto a la democracia con imperfecciones, con problemas, con dolores y turbulencias; pero también es cierto que las heridas de la pobreza siguen abiertas en la mayoría de estas naciones como 30 años atrás o aun peor, como Argentina, en espera de ver quién la salva. |Example.Gloss=today said Rossi almost all the countries Latin-American have turned to the democracy with imperfections with problems with pains and turmoils but also is true that the wounds of the poverty continue open in the majority of these nations like 30 years before or even worse like Argentina in wait of see who it saves |Example.English translation=Today, said Rossi, almost all of the Latin American nations have turned to democracy with imperfections, problems, pains and turmoils. But it's also true that in most of these nations, the wounds of poverty remain open just like 30 years ago or even worse, like Argentina, waiting to see who will save them. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2004/09/01/04an1cul.php?origen=index.html&fly=1 |Example.Comments=las heridas de la pobreza siguen abiertas }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Ideologías, movimientos bélicos y pacíficos, iniciativas y acuerdos multinacionales y más, mucho más, se ha pretendido estructurar para paliar necesidades, sin duda mucho se ha logrado, otro tanto evitado, pero la realidad nos dice que la gran mayoría de los pueblos viven agobiados por los dolores de la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=ideologies movements warlike and peaceful initiatives and agreements multinational and more much more refl has claimed structure to palliate needs without doubt much refl has achieved other some avoided but the reality us tells that the great majority of the communities live crushed by the pains of the poverty |Example.English translation=Ideologies, militant and peaceful movements, multinational initiatives and agreements and more, much more, has been claimed to provide the structure to alleviate needs. Without doubt much has been achieved, while much has not, but reality tells us that the great majority of communities live crushed by the pains of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oem.com.mx/eloccidental/notas/n2020416.htm |Example.Comments=los pueblos viven agobiados por los dolores de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=En forma subrepticia, la cadena televisiva introdujo a sus modelos, las más parecidas a nuestras indígenas de la sierra Tarahumara, que son morenas, ajadas de cara, con las cicatrices de la pobreza en el rostro, serias (modestas, sería lo correcto), llevando con orgullo su vestimenta clásica, con la que han transitado las mujeres serranas durante generaciones enteras. |Example.Gloss=in form surreptitious the channel television introduced to its models those most similar-in-appearance to our indigenous of the mountain-range Tarahumara that are dark-skinned haggard of face with the scars of the poverty on the face serious modest would-be the correct carrying with pride their garments classic with which that have move the women of-the-Sierra during generations entire |Example.English translation=Surreptitiously, the television channel introduced their models, those that look most similar to the indigenous people of the Tarahumara mountains, who are dark-skinned, with haggard faces, bearing the scars of poverty, stern ("modest" would be more appropriate), proudly wearing the traditional garments that women of the Sierra have worn for generations. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oem.com.mx/elmexicano/notas/n2020923.htm |Example.Comments=cicatrices de la pobreza }} |Entered by=Joe |Last reviewed by=Karie |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=bureaucracy is a machine |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=BUROCRACIA ES UNA MÁQUINA }} |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=Máquina |Target schema=Gobierno |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Hay una clara falta de experiencia, de entendimiento de la máquina burocrática, y se les está haciendo difícil comenzar a tomar decisiones. |Example.Gloss=there-is a clear lack of experience of understanding of the machine bureaucratic and refl ind.obj is making difficult commence to take decisions |Example.English translation=There is a clear lack of experience, of understanding of the bureaucratic machine, and it's making it difficult for them to make decisions. |Example.Provenance=http://noticias.terra.com.mx/mundo/politica-a-la-parmesana,6ba57573fb569310VgnVCM5000009ccceb0aRCRD.html }} |Entered by=Oana, JOE |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=BUREAUCRACY IS A MACHINE |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=bureaucracy is a machine |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=BUROCRACIA ES UNA MÁQUINA }} |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=Máquina |Target schema=Gobierno |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Los partidos que integramos el frente no necesitamos ser una máquina burocrática para satisfacer intereses pequeños |Example.Gloss=the parties that integrate the front not we-need be a machine bureaucratic to satisfy interests small |Example.English translation=The parties making up the Front [Frente Amplio Progresista (FAP)] don't need to be a bureaucratic machine in order to satisfy small interests. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2007/12/26/index.php?section=politica&article=007n1pol }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=BUREAUCRACY IS A MACHINE |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Source schema=Movimiento |Target schema=Poder |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Cuando Iturbide cayó del poder, Bravo fue nombrado individuo del Poder Ejecutivo y ocupó la vicepresidencia de la República. |Example.Gloss=When Iturbide fell from power Bravo was named individual of-the Power Executive and occupied the vice-presidency of the Republic |Example.English translation=When Iturbide fell from power, Bravo was named head of the Executive Branch and occupied the vice presidency of the Republic. |Example.Provenance=http://www.tribunadelabahia.com.mx/noticiasdepuertovallarta/index.cfm?op=por2&recordID=31395&seccion=Mente&tit=Nicol%C3%A1s%20Bravo,%20un%20%20libertador%20de%20noble%20acci%C3%B3n }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DIMINISHMENT OF POWER IS MOVING DOWNWARDS |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

page.title: Metaphor:CAUSAR UNA REDUCCIÓN DEL CRIMEN ES TRATAR UNA ENFERMEDAD

revision.comment: CSV importación
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Tags=tentative |Target schema= |Source schema= |Family=Gobernación |Entered by=Oana |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish |Aliases= |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=cause a reduction of-the crime es treating a disease |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=CAUSAR UNA REDUCCIÓN DEL CRIMEN ES TRATAR UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Enfermedad |Target schema=Crimen |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Se necesita autoridad frente al crimen organizado, derrotarlo con toda la severidad de autoridad y se necesita cultura ciudadana para inocular en la sociedad principios, valores que rechacen al crimen organizado. |Example.Gloss=one needs authority front to-the crime organized vanquish-it with all the severity of authority and one needs culture citizen for inoculate in the society principals values that reject to-the crime organized |Example.English translation=We need authority in the face of organized crime, to vanquish it with full severity of authority and we need a citizen culture to inoculate society with principals, values, that reject organized crime. |Example.Provenance=http://www.sep.gob.mx/es/sep1/Version_estenografica_de_la_Conferencia_Magistral_Educacion_y_valores_para_la_Convivencia_que_dicto_el_senor_Alvaro_Uribe#.UUo4hlvwJSY }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=cause a reduction of-the crime es treating a disease |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=CAUSAR UNA REDUCCIÓN DEL CRIMEN ES TRATAR UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Tags=tentative |Family=Gobernación |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=Enfermedad |Target schema=Crimen |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=CRIMEN ES ENFERMEDAD }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Se necesita autoridad frente al crimen organizado, derrotarlo con toda la severidad de autoridad y se necesita cultura ciudadana para inocular en la sociedad principios, valores que rechacen al crimen organizado. |Example.Gloss=one needs authority front to-the crime organized vanquish-it with all the severity of authority and one needs culture citizen for inoculate in the society principals values that reject to-the crime organized |Example.English translation=We need authority in the face of organized crime, to vanquish it with full severity of authority and we need a citizen culture to inoculate society with principals, values, that reject organized crime. |Example.Provenance=http://www.sep.gob.mx/es/sep1/Version_estenografica_de_la_Conferencia_Magistral_Educacion_y_valores_para_la_Convivencia_que_dicto_el_senor_Alvaro_Uribe#.UUo4hlvwJSY }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish |Relevant LUs= }}

page.title: Metaphor:TASAS DE INTERÉS ES UN MECANISMO

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=rates of interest is a mechanism |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=TASAS DE INTERÉS ES UN MECANISMO }} |Source schema=Máquina, Mecanis...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=rates of interest is a mechanism |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=TASAS DE INTERÉS ES UN MECANISMO }} |Source schema=Máquina, Mecanismo |Target schema=Economía |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Un problema fundamental del BCE es que su conformación implicó la eliminación de dos variables de ajuste importantes: el mecanismo de tasas de interés de cada país y el del tipo de cambio, sin sustituirlos por nada; por lo que, cuando un país en lo individual enfrenta una crisis, no tiene forma de adaptarse a través de políticas monetarias o de tipo de cambio. |Example.Gloss=a problem fundamental of.the EBC is that its configuration involved the elimination of two variables of adjustment important: the mechanism of rate of interest of each country and that of.the type of exchange, without replacing.them by nothing; by it that, when a country in it individual faces a crisis, not it.has way of adapting.itself through policies monetary or of type of exchange |Example.English translation="A fundamental problem of the EBC is that its formation involved the elimination of two important adjustment variables: the interest rate mechanism for each country and that of the exchange rate, without replacing them with anything; so that, when an individual country faces a crisis, it has no way of adapting itself via monetary policies or exchange rates." |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/mercados-estadisticas/2013/04/02/otra-realidad |Example.Annotation="el mecanismo de tasas de interés" }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=proposed |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=rates of interest is a mechanism |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=TASAS DE INTERÉS ES UN MECANISMO }} |Source schema=Máquina |Target schema=Economía |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Un problema fundamental del BCE es que su conformación implicó la eliminación de dos variables de ajuste importantes: el mecanismo de tasas de interés de cada país y el del tipo de cambio, sin sustituirlos por nada; por lo que, cuando un país en lo individual enfrenta una crisis, no tiene forma de adaptarse a través de políticas monetarias o de tipo de cambio. |Example.Gloss=a problem fundamental of.the EBC is that its configuration involved the elimination of two variables of adjustment important: the mechanism of rate of interest of each country and that of.the type of exchange, without replacing.them by nothing; by it that, when a country in it individual faces a crisis, not it.has way of adapting.itself through policies monetary or of type of exchange |Example.English translation="A fundamental problem of the EBC is that its formation involved the elimination of two important adjustment variables: the interest rate mechanism for each country and that of the exchange rate, without replacing them with anything; so that, when an individual country faces a crisis, it has no way of adapting itself via monetary policies or exchange rates." |Example.Provenance=http://eleconomista.com.mx/mercados-estadisticas/2013/04/02/otra-realidad |Example.Annotation="el mecanismo de tasas de interés" }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=proposed |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=analysis of poverty is diagnosis of a disease |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=ANÁLISIS DE LA POBREZA ES DIAGNÓSTICO DE UNA ENFERMEDAD }} entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=POBREZA ES UNA ENFERMEDAD }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=El diagnóstico fenoménico atiende a los síntomas de la pobreza, que son básicamente carencias: de alimentación, salud, educación, entre muchas otras. |Example.Gloss=the diagnosis phenomenic attends to the symptoms of the poverty that are basically shortages of food health education among many others |Example.English translation=The phenomenic diagnosis attends to the symptoms of poverty, which are basically shortages: of food, health, poverty in Mexico, using the various sources of information and descriptions of the indicators of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://coepo.app.jalisco.gob.mx/PDF/LibroDiezproblemas/Capitulo7.pdf
