revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=impediments to improve the state economic are forces crushing |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=IMPEDIMENTOS PARA MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO SON FUERZAS APLASTANTES }} |Family=Pobreza |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=Fuerza física |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=DIFICULTADES SON IMPEDIMENTOS AL MOVIMIENTO }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=MEJORAR EL ESTADO ECONÓMICO ES SALIR DE UN LUGAR INDESEABLE }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=CAUSAS SON FUERZAS }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Aunque, todo sea un sin sentido, el PAN oprime a los pobres para ser más pobres, pero si un pobre progresa, entonces se vuelve apoyador del PAN. |Example.Gloss=However, everything being a without sense the PAN oppresses to the poor to be more poor but if a poor-person makes-progress then refl turns supporter of-the PAN |Example.English translation=However, since nothing makes sense, the PAN oppresses the poor, making them poorer, but if a poor person makes progress, then they turn into a PAN supporter. |Example.Provenance=http://www.eluniversal.com.mx/notas/610155.html |Example.Comments=el PAN oprime a los pobres }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Sin embargo, no sólo en nuestro país, sino en muchos otros, la mayoría de la población sufre opresión económica no debido a su pereza, sino a las malas decisiones de gobernantes y líderes políticos que por su ambición y falta de sabiduría para manejar los asuntos financieros del país, llevan a la pobreza a sus gobernados y dan bienestar y ganancias económicas a unos cuantos. |Example.Gloss=we-notice without restriction that although the process of globalization constitutes a force dynamic that can benefit to all the countries in the practice its benefits refl distribute very unbalanced and we-express our determination of prevent and punish and mitigate the effects negative of globalization that carry to the poverty to-the underdevelopment and the exclusion social |Example.English translation=We note, nevertheless, that even though the process of globalization constitutes a dynamic force that could benefit all nations, in practice its benefits are distributed very unequally and we express our determination to prevent, punish, and mitigate the negative effects of globalization, which lead to poverty, underdevelopment, and social exclusion. |Example.Provenance=http://fox.presidencia.gob.mx/actividades/visitaoficial/?contenido=19201 |Example.Comments=población sufre opresión económica }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=En la sesión solemne, saliéndose de su propio guión, Mora Aguirre repasó –con pocos efectos en el público asistente–, algunos de los 23 postulados del documento Sentimientos de la Nación, cuando al referirse a aquel en el que el general José María Morelos y Pavón planteó que en una nación justa debían eliminarse las imposiciones que más agobian a los pobres, cuando a propósito del tema demandó una distribución más equitativa de los impuestos. |Example.Gloss=in the session solemn going-out of his own script Mora Aguirre went-over with little effect on the public attending some of the 23 tenets of the document Feelings of the Nation when at-the referring tothat in which that the general José María Morelos y Pavón claimed that in a nation fair should be-eliminated the impositions that most crush to the poor when at purpose of-the theme demanded a distribution more equitable of the taxes |Example.English translation=In the somber session, breaking with his script, Mora Aguirre went over--with little effect on the public in attendance--some of the 23 tenets of the document Feelings of the Nation, referring to that document in which the general José María Morelos y Pavón affirmed that in a just nation, the obligations that most heavily crush the poor should be eliminated, when in accordance with the theme, he demanded a more equitable distribution of taxes. |Example.Provenance=http://www.lajornadaguerrero.com.mx/2008/09/14/index.php?section=politica&article=003n2pol |Example.Comments=las imposiciones que más agobian a los pobres }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Ideologías, movimientos bélicos y pacíficos, iniciativas y acuerdos multinacionales y más, mucho más, se ha pretendido estructurar para paliar necesidades, sin duda mucho se ha logrado, otro tanto evitado, pero la realidad nos dice que la gran mayoría de los pueblos viven agobiados por los dolores de la pobreza. |Example.Gloss=ideologies movements warlike and peaceful initiatives and agreements multinational and more much more refl has claimed structure to palliate needs without doubt much refl has achieved other some avoided but the reality us tells that the great majority of the communities live crushed by the pains of the poverty |Example.English translation=Ideologies, militant and peaceful movements, multinational initiatives and agreements and more, much more, has been claimed to provide the structure to alleviate needs. Without doubt much has been achieved, while much has not, but reality tells us that the great majority of communities live crushed by the pains of poverty. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oem.com.mx/eloccidental/notas/n2020416.htm |Example.Comments=pueblos viven agobiados por los dolores de la pobreza }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=wealth is up |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=RIQUEZA ES ARRIBA }} |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Dinero |Mappings= |Relate...»
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=wealth is up |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=RIQUEZA ES ARRIBA }} |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Dinero |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Que los de arriba paguen, pero se van a negar |Example.Gloss=That those of above pay but refl go to deny |Example.English translation=Those at the top need to pay, but they will deny it. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2012/06/02/politica/009n1pol }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=wealth is up |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=RIQUEZA ES ARRIBA }} |Source schema=Verticalidad |Target schema=Dinero |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=ESTADOS SON LUGARES }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=makes use of |Related metaphor.Name=MÁS ES ARRIBA }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Que los de arriba paguen, pero se van a negar |Example.Gloss=That those of above pay but refl go to deny |Example.English translation=Those at the top need to pay, but they will deny it. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2012/06/02/politica/009n1pol }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Porque eso signiﬁca que uno está convencido de que los que están en el fondo de la sociedad merecen su fracaso y los que están arriba merecen su éxito. |Example.Gloss=because that signifies that one is convinced of that those that are in the bottom of the society deserve their failure and those that are above deserve their success |Example.English translation=Because that means that one is convinced that those at the bottom of society deserve their failure and those that are on top deserve their success. |Example.Provenance=http://portal.iteso.mx/portal/page/portal/Sinectica/Historico/Numeros_anteriores06/029/libros.pdf |Example.Comments="los que están arriba" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Una cosa es que los ricos se estuvieran haciendo más ricos y a los de en medio y a los de abajo también les fuera mejor, sobre todo si los esfuerzos de los de arriba fueran cruciales para los éxitos de los demás. En ese caso podríamos celebrar los éxitos de los de arriba, y estarles agradecidos por su contribución. Pero eso no es lo que ha venido ocurriendo. |Example.Gloss=one thing is that the rich refl were making more rich and to those of in middle and to those of above also to-them it-went better above all if the efforts of those of above were crucial for the successes of the rest. In that case we-could celebrate the successes of those of above and be-to-them grateful for their contribution but that not is what that has come occurring |Example.English translation=One thing would be for the rich to get richer while those in the middle class and at the bottom also improve, above all if the efforts of those on top were crucial for the successes of everyone else. In that case we could celebrate the successes of those on top and be grateful to them for their contribution. But this is not what has been happening. |Example.Provenance=http://www.razon.com.mx/spip.php?page=columnista&id_article=156698 |Example.Annotation="los de arriba" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Las personas de clase alta son más propensas a violar las leyes de tránsito, a comer un caramelo destinado a otros o a mentir para enriquecerse aún más, según un estudio realizado en Estados Unidos y Canadá. |Example.Gloss=The people of class high are more inclined to violate the laws of transit to eat a candy destined to others or to lie in-order-to enrich-themselves even more, according-to a study realized in States United and Canada. |Example.English translation=People in the high class are more likely to violate traffic laws, eat a candy meant for someone else, or lie in order to enrich themselves even more, according to a study carried out in the U.S. and Canada. |Example.Provenance=http://www.jornada.unam.mx/2012/02/28/ciencias/a02n1cie |Example.Comments="clase alta" }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=La probabilidad de que su familia logre avanzar en la escalera socioeconómica, y sobre todo que llegue a los peldaños más altos, es sumamente baja. |Example.Gloss=The probability of that their family achieves advance in the ladder socioeconomic and above all that arrives to the rungs most high es extremely low |Example.English translation=The chance that one's family manages to advance in the socioeconomic ladder, and above all to make it to the highest rungs, is extremely low. |Example.Provenance=http://www.oportunidadesdenegocios.mx/genericas/textoON.asp?id_noticia=6092875 |Example.Comments=los peldaños más altos }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza que vive en el olvido, con los desgarradores contrastes entre el México de arriba y sus sueños de desarrollo y el México de abajo y su lucha cotidiana por sobrevivir. |Example.Gloss=Us submerge in the abyss of the poverty that lives in the forgetting with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico of above and their dreams of development and the Mexico of below and their struggle daily to survive. |Example.English translation=We are submerged in the abyss of poverty that lives forgotten, with the heartbreaking contrasts between the Mexico on top and their dreams of development and the Mexico at the bottom and their daily struggle to survive. |Example.Provenance=http://ladobe.com.mx/2012/03/mexico-rebelde-de-john-gibler/ |Example.Comments=el México de arriba }} |Entered by=Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}

|Example.Provenance=http://www.oportunidadesdenegocios.mx/genericas/textoON.asp?id_noticia=6092875 |Example.Comments=los peldaños más altos }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Nos sumerge en el abismo de la pobreza que vive en el olvido, con los desgarradores contrastes entre el México de arriba y sus sueños de desarrollo y el México de abajo y su lucha cotidiana por page.title: Metaphor:POBREZA ES UN IMPEDIMENTO DE MOVIMIENTO

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is an impediment to motion |Aliases= |Source schema=Impedimentos de movimiento |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=POVERTY IS A MOTION IMPEDIMENT |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is an impediment to motion |Aliases= |Source schema=Impedimentos de movimiento |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=...dijo que en México hace falta que la democracia “evolucione de ser ... obstáculo de la pobreza imperante en la mayor parte de nuestro mundo". |Example.English translation=... said that Mexico it is necessary that democracy "evolves from being ... obstacle of poverty prevailing in most of our world." |Example.Provenance=http://www.cronica.com.mx/notas/2002/34658.html }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=POVERTY IS A MOTION IMPEDIMENT |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is an impediment to motion |Aliases= |Family=Metáforas de Pobreza, |Source schema=Impedimentos de movimiento |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=...dijo que en México hace falta que la democracia “evolucione de ser ... obstáculo de la pobreza imperante en la mayor parte de nuestro mundo". |Example.English translation=... said that Mexico it is necessary that democracy "evolves from being ... obstacle of poverty prevailing in most of our world." |Example.Provenance=http://www.cronica.com.mx/notas/2002/34658.html }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=POVERTY IS A MOTION IMPEDIMENT |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=poverty is an impediment to motion |Aliases= |Family=Metáforas de Pobreza, |Source schema=Impedimentos de movimiento |Target schema=Pobreza |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=...dijo que en México hace falta que la democracia “evolucione de ser ... obstáculo de la pobreza imperante en la mayor parte de nuestro mundo". |Example.English translation=... said that Mexico it is necessary that democracy "evolves from being ... obstacle of poverty prevailing in most of our world." |Example.Provenance=http://www.cronica.com.mx/notas/2002/34658.html |Example.Annotation=obstáculo de la pobreza }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Sin embargo, no solo la pobreza es un impedimento, pues también es una realidad que existen desventajas para los niños y las niñas discapacitadas, para los niños indígenas, para los que viven en las colonias y zonas urbanas marginadas, agregó. |Example.English translation=However, poverty is not only an impediment, it is also a fact that there are disadvantages for children and disabled girls, for indigenous children, those living in the colonies and marginalized urban areas, he added. |Example.Provenance=http://www.cronica.com.mx/notas/2014/820717.html |Example.Annotation=la pobreza es un impedimento }} |Entered by=Karie, |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=POVERTY IS A MOTION IMPEDIMENT |Investigated for=Spanish }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=economy is an organism |Aliases= |Source schema=Organismo |Target schema=Economía |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Hallan secreto para una economía sana |Example.Gloss=they-find secret for an economy healthy |Example.English translation=Secret of a healthy economy found |Example.Provenance=http://www.razon.com.mx/spip.php?article143670 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Spanish |Example.Text=Millones de pobres tanto en países ricos como en vías de desarrollo sufren las condiciones de una economía enferma que busca solución. |Example.Gloss=millions of poor-people as-much in countries rich as in paths of development suffer the conditions of an economy sick that searches solution |Example.English translation=Millions of poor people, in rich countries as well as developing ones, suffer under the condition of a sick economy searching for a solution. |Example.Provenance=http://www.zocalo.com.mx/seccion/opinion-articulo/salvacion-global }} |Entered by=Oana, Joe |Status=in development |Investigated for=Spanish }}
